DataSource.RecordSource:
-- ============================================= -- Author: Manikanta.G.S. -- Alter date: 04/01/2012 -- Description: Get Main Diagnostic Report Details for GYN PAP -- ============================================= --CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[usp_GetMainDiagnosticReportDetails_GYNPAP] -- ( DECLARE @iCaseID BIGINT = -9999, @iPreviewReport BIT = -5555 -- ) --AS BEGIN -- SET NOCOUNT ON added to prevent extra result sets FROM -- interfering with SELECT statements. SET NOCOUNT ON; --BEGIN TRY
DECLARE @ShowSchematicDisplay NVARCHAR(50), @ShowSignOutTime NVARCHAR(10), @TechnicalServicesConfig NVARCHAR(250), @ShowScreenTechSignOnReport NVARCHAR(10), @AccountName NVARCHAR(250), @ShowDetailBelowSignature NVARCHAR(50),@ShowRTFReport NVARCHAR(50),@AcctId BIGINT, @ShowPreviousVersionTable NVARCHAR(50),@SkipGrossingStatus NVARCHAR(20)='false',@OrganizationID BIGINT,@casetype NVARCHAR(100),@LabAccountID BIGINT;
DECLARE @AmendmentReasonPresent NVARCHAR(50),@AddendumReasonPresent NVARCHAR(50), @CorrectionReasonPresent NVARCHAR(50), @ReportStatus NVARCHAR(50),@CountSupp BIGINT,@SiteName VARCHAR(300), @caseStatus NVARCHAR(300), @signType NVARCHAR(250), @ReportCaseStatus NVARCHAR(300), @PreviousStatus NVARCHAR(100), @ReviewPathCanSignout BIT
DECLARE @ScreenedBy NVARCHAR(250),@procattr1 NVARCHAR(50),@procattr2 NVARCHAR(50),@procattr3 NVARCHAR(50), @procattr4 NVARCHAR(50),@procattr5 NVARCHAR(50), @procattr6 NVARCHAR(1000),@procattr7 NVARCHAR(1000), @icaseprocid BIGINT, @procedureName NVARCHAR(255) DECLARE @isCTadded NVARCHAR(20) = 'false', @isNGadded NVARCHAR(20) = 'false', @isCTNGadded NVARCHAR(20) = 'false', @isHPVadded NVARCHAR(20) = 'false', @isHPV1618added NVARCHAR(20) = 'false', @isTrichonomasadded NVARCHAR(20) = 'false', @isCandidaSpeciesadded NVARCHAR(20) = 'false', @isGardnerellaVaginalisadded NVARCHAR(20) = 'false', @isTrichonomasVaginalisadded NVARCHAR(20) = 'false', @isLactoisadded NVARCHAR(20) = 'false', @isCandidaGlabrataisadded NVARCHAR(20) = 'false', @isCandidaOtherisadded NVARCHAR(20) = 'false', @isATDPisadded NVARCHAR(20) = 'false', @isCandidaGroupisadded NVARCHAR(20) = 'false', @isCandidakruseiisadded NVARCHAR(20) = 'false', @isNewCandidaglabrataisadded NVARCHAR(20) = 'false', @isHSV12added NVARCHAR(20) = 'false', @isBacterialVaginosisisadded NVARCHAR(20) = 'false', @isCANDIDAVAGINITISadded NVARCHAR(20) = 'false', @isCOVID19U0001isadded NVARCHAR(20)= 'false', @isCOVID19U0002isadded NVARCHAR(20)= 'false'
DECLARE @CTRESULT NVARCHAR(2000), @CTCOMMENTS NVARCHAR(2000), @NGRESULT NVARCHAR(2000), @NGCOMMENTS NVARCHAR(2000), @CTNGRESULT NVARCHAR(2000), @CTNGCOMMENTS NVARCHAR(2000), @HPVRESULT NVARCHAR(2000), @HPVCOMMENTS NVARCHAR(2000), @HPV16RESULT NVARCHAR(2000), @HPV18RESULT NVARCHAR(2000), @HPV1618COMMENTS NVARCHAR(2000), @TRICHOMONASRESULT NVARCHAR(2000), @TRICHOMONASCOMMENTS NVARCHAR(2000), @CANDIDASPECIESRESULT NVARCHAR(2000), @CANDIDASPECIESCOMMENTS NVARCHAR(2000), @GARDNERELLAVAGINALISRESULT NVARCHAR(2000),@GARDNERELLAVAGINALISCOMMENTS NVARCHAR(2000), @TRICHOMONASVAGINALISRESULT NVARCHAR(2000), @TRICHOMONASVAGINALISCOMMENTS NVARCHAR(2000), @HSV1RESULT NVARCHAR(2000),@HSV2RESULT NVARCHAR(2000), @HSV12COMMENTS NVARCHAR(2000), @LACTOISRESULT NVARCHAR(2000),@LACTOISCOMMENTS NVARCHAR(2000), @CANDIDAGLABRATAISRESULT NVARCHAR(2000),@CANDIDAGLABRATAISCOMMENTS NVARCHAR(2000), @CANDIDAOTHERISRESULT NVARCHAR(2000),@CANDIDAOTHERISCOMMENTS NVARCHAR(2000), @ATDPRESULT NVARCHAR(2000),@ATDPISCOMMENTS NVARCHAR(2000), @CANDIDAGROUPRESULT NVARCHAR(2000),@CANDIDAGROUPISCOMMENTS NVARCHAR(2000), @NEWCANDIDAGLABRATARESULT NVARCHAR(2000),@NEWCANDIDAGLABRATAISCOMMENTS NVARCHAR(2000), @CANDIDAKRUSEIRESULT NVARCHAR(2000),@CANDIDAKRUSEIISCOMMENTS NVARCHAR(2000), @BACTERIALVAGINOSISISRESULT NVARCHAR(2000),@BACTERIALVAGINOSISISCOMMENTS NVARCHAR(2000), @CANDIDAVAGINITISRESULT NVARCHAR(2000),@CANDIDAVAGINITISCOMMENTS NVARCHAR(2000), @COVID19U0001RESULT NVARCHAR(2000),@COVID19U0001ISCOMMENTS NVARCHAR(2000), @COVID19U0002RESULT NVARCHAR(2000),@COVID19U0002ISCOMMENTS NVARCHAR(2000)
SELECT @AcctId = CASE services WHEN 'Technical Only' THEN OfAccountid ELSE LabAccountId END FROM Cases WHERE caseid = @iCaseID
SELECT @ShowSchematicDisplay = ExtAttrValue FROM Accounts a LEFT JOIN VAEntityExtAttributes vat ON a.organizationid = vat.entityid WHERE a.accountid IN ( SELECT CASE services WHEN 'Technical Only' THEN OFAccountId ELSE LabAccountId END FROM Cases WHERE caseid = @iCaseID ) AND vat.ExtAttrName = 'Reports.ShowSchematicDisplay'
SELECT @ShowRTFReport = ExtAttrValue FROM VAEntityExtAttributes vat WHERE vat.entityid = @AcctId AND vat.ExtAttrName = 'Report.ShowRTFReport'
SELECT @ShowRTFReport = ISNULL(LOWER(@ShowRTFReport), 'True')
/*The signature for screening technologist is configured IN the account level, earlier it was configured IN the Organization level for clinical chemistry case type.So using Accountcasetype table instead of organizationcasetype table to retrieve STSignConfig --Lokesh */
SELECT @ShowScreenTechSignOnReport = ISNULL(STSignConfig,0) FROM AccountCasetypes AC INNER JOIN dbo.Cases C ON C.casetype = AC.casetype AND C.LabAccountId = AC.accountid WHERE CaseID = @iCaseID
SELECT @ShowSchematicDisplay = ISNULL(LOWER(@ShowSchematicDisplay), 'true')
SELECT @ShowDetailBelowSignature = ExtAttrValue FROM Accounts a LEFT JOIN VAEntityExtAttributes vat ON a.organizationid = vat.entityid WHERE a.accountid IN ( SELECT CASE services WHEN 'Technical Only' THEN OFAccountId ELSE LabAccountId END FROM Cases WHERE caseid = @iCaseID ) AND vat.ExtAttrName = 'Report.ShowDetailsBelowSignature'
SELECT @ShowDetailBelowSignature = ISNULL(LOWER(@ShowDetailBelowSignature), 'false')
SELECT @ShowPreviousVersionTable = ExtAttrValue FROM Accounts a LEFT JOIN VAEntityExtAttributes vat ON a.organizationid = vat.entityid WHERE a.accountid IN ( SELECT CASE services WHEN 'Technical Only' THEN OFAccountId ELSE LabAccountId END FROM Cases WHERE caseid = @iCaseID ) AND vat.ExtAttrName = 'Report.ShowPreviousVersionTable'
SELECT @ShowPreviousVersionTable = ISNULL(LOWER(@ShowPreviousVersionTable), 'false')
SELECT @AmendmentReasonPresent=CASE RTRIM(ISNULL(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(250), AmendmentReason), '')) WHEN '' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END , @AddendumReasonPresent=CASE RTRIM(ISNULL(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(250), AddendumReason), '')) WHEN '' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END , @CorrectionReasonPresent=CASE RTRIM(ISNULL(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(250), CorrectionReason), '')) WHEN '' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, @ReportStatus=reportstatus, @caseStatus = status FROM Cases WHERE caseid=@iCaseID
SELECT TOP 1 @signType = signtype FROM CaseSignatures WHERE caseid = @iCaseID order by signid desc
IF (ISNULL(@caseStatus,'') <> '') BEGIN IF @caseStatus='Addendum - Pending Sign-out' OR @caseStatus='Addendum - Pending Tests' SET @ReportCaseStatus = 'Addendum' ELSE IF @caseStatus='Amendment - Pending Sign-out' OR @caseStatus='Amendment - Pending Tests' OR @caseStatus='Amendment Pending Tests' SET @ReportCaseStatus = 'Amendment' ELSE IF (@caseStatus='Diagnosis' OR @caseStatus='Send For Consult') AND (@signType='Final' OR @signType='First Pathologist') SET @ReportCaseStatus = 'Final' ELSE IF (@caseStatus='Diagnosis - Pending Tests' OR @caseStatus='Send For Consult - Pending Tests') AND @signType='Final' SET @ReportCaseStatus = 'Final' ELSE IF (@caseStatus='Diagnosis' OR @caseStatus='Send For Consult') AND @signType='Preliminary' SET @ReportCaseStatus = 'Preliminary' ELSE IF (@caseStatus='Diagnosis - Pending Tests' OR @caseStatus='Send For Consult - Pending Tests') AND @signType='Preliminary' SET @ReportCaseStatus = 'Preliminary' ELSE IF @caseStatus='Correction - Pending Sign-out' OR @caseStatus='Correction - Pending Tests' AND @signType='Correction' SET @ReportCaseStatus = 'Corrected' ELSE IF @caseStatus='Review' OR @caseStatus='Review - Pending Tests' SET @ReportCaseStatus = 'Review' ELSE IF (@caseStatus='Finalized' OR @caseStatus='Pending Finish Case' OR @caseStatus='Finish Case - Pending Tests' ) --Changed case status 'Revision - Pending Sign-Out','Revision - Pending Tests' TO 'Pending Finish Case','Finish Case – Pending Tests' FOR 597CR AND @signType='Correction' SET @ReportCaseStatus = 'Corrected' ELSE IF @ReportStatus IS NOT NULL OR @ReportStatus <> '' SET @ReportCaseStatus = @ReportStatus ELSE SET @ReportCaseStatus = 'Final' END
SELECT @ReviewPathCanSignout = ISNULL(ReviewPathCanSignout,0) FROM Users WHERE UserID IN (SELECT TOP 1 UserID FROM CaseAssignments WHERE CaseID=@iCaseID AND Signer = 0 AND assignmenttype='Pathologist Account' ORDER BY CaseAssignID DESC)
IF(@ReviewPathCanSignout = 0) BEGIN SELECT @PreviousStatus = dbo.GetPreviousStatus(@iCaseID)
IF((@PreviousStatus='Addendum - Pending Sign-out' OR @PreviousStatus='Addendum - Pending Tests') AND (@caseStatus='Review' OR @caseStatus='Review - Pending Tests')) SET @ReportCaseStatus = 'Addendum' ELSE IF((@PreviousStatus='Amendment - Pending Sign-out' OR @PreviousStatus='Amendment - Pending Tests' OR @PreviousStatus='Amendment Pending Tests') AND (@caseStatus='Review' OR @caseStatus='Review - Pending Tests')) SET @ReportCaseStatus = 'Amendment' END
SELECT @ScreenedBy = FormattedDisplayName FROM Users WHERE userid = (SELECT ScreenedBy FROM Cases WHERE caseid= @icaseID)
--SELECT @CountSupp=COUNT(*) FROM CaseSupplementals WHERE caseid=@iCaseID AND ISNULL(category,'')=''
SELECT @CountSupp = COUNT(*) FROM CaseSupplementals cs LEFT JOIN CaseSupplementalVersions csv ON CS.fileid=CSV.SupplementalFileId WHERE cs.caseid =@icaseid AND ISNULL( csv.IsActive, 1)=1 AND (ISNULL(category,'')='' OR category = 'Send Out Report')
SELECT TOP 1 @AccountName = A.accountname FROM Accounts A INNER JOIN CaseAssignments CA ON CA.AccountID = A.AccountID WHERE CA.AssignmentType = 'Pathologist Account' AND CA.CaseID = @iCaseID AND (Signer = 0 OR Signer IS NULL) SELECT @icaseprocid = MIN(caseprocedureid) FROM Caseprocedures WHERE CaseID = @iCaseID and status NOT IN ('cancelled','Deleted')
WHILE(@icaseprocid IS NOT NULL) BEGIN
select @procedureName= procedurename from CaseProcedures where caseprocedureid =@icaseprocid IF(@procedureName = 'CT') BEGIN SELECT @CTRESULT = ISNULL(NULLIF(procattr1, ''), @CTRESULT) ,@CTCOMMENTS=ISNULL(NULLIF(procattr3, ''), @CTCOMMENTS),@CTNGCOMMENTS=ISNULL(NULLIF(procattr3, ''), @CTNGCOMMENTS)from CaseProcedures where caseprocedureid =@icaseprocid SET @isCTadded ='true' END ELSE IF(@procedureName = 'NG') BEGIN SELECT @NGRESULT = ISNULL(NULLIF(procattr1, ''), @NGRESULT),@NGCOMMENTS=ISNULL(NULLIF(procattr3, ''), @NGCOMMENTS),@CTNGCOMMENTS=ISNULL(NULLIF(procattr3, ''), @CTNGCOMMENTS) from CaseProcedures where caseprocedureid =@icaseprocid SET @isNGadded = 'true' END ELSE IF(@procedureName = 'CT/NG ') BEGIN SET @isCTNGadded ='true' SELECT @CTRESULT = ISNULL(NULLIF(procattr4, ''), @CTRESULT),@NGRESULT = ISNULL(NULLIF(procattr5, ''), @NGRESULT),@CTNGCOMMENTS=ISNULL(NULLIF(procattr7, ''),@CTNGCOMMENTS) from CaseProcedures where caseprocedureid =@icaseprocid END ELSE IF(@procedureName = 'HPV 16/18/45' OR @procedureName = 'HPV 16/18' OR @procedureName = 'HPV 16 &18/45' OR @procedureName = 'HPV 16 & 18' OR REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(@procedureName,'&',''),'/',''),'+',''),' ','') IN ('HPV1618','HPV161845')) BEGIN SET @isHPV1618added = 'true' SELECT @HPV16RESULT = ISNULL(NULLIF(procattr1, ''), @HPV16RESULT),@HPV18RESULT=ISNULL(NULLIF(procattr2, ''), @HPV18RESULT),@HPV1618COMMENTS=ISNULL(NULLIF(procattr3, ''), @HPV1618COMMENTS) from CaseProcedures where caseprocedureid =@icaseprocid END ELSE IF(@procedureName = 'Hybrid Capture (HPV)'OR @procedureName ='HPV HR') BEGIN SET @isHPVadded = 'true' SELECT @HPVRESULT = ISNULL(NULLIF(procattr1, ''), @HPVRESULT),@HPVCOMMENTS=ISNULL(NULLIF(procattr3, ''), @HPVCOMMENTS) from CaseProcedures where caseprocedureid =@icaseprocid END ELSE IF(LOWER(@procedureName) = 'trichomonas') BEGIN SET @isTrichonomasadded = 'true' SELECT @TRICHOMONASRESULT = ISNULL(NULLIF(procattr1, ''), @TRICHOMONASRESULT),@TRICHOMONASCOMMENTS=ISNULL(NULLIF(procattr3, ''), @TRICHOMONASCOMMENTS) from CaseProcedures where caseprocedureid =@icaseprocid END ELSE IF(LOWER(@procedureName) = 'trichomonas vaginalis') BEGIN SET @isTrichonomasVaginalisadded = 'true' SELECT @TRICHOMONASVAGINALISRESULT = ISNULL(NULLIF(procattr1, ''), @TRICHOMONASVAGINALISRESULT),@TRICHOMONASVAGINALISCOMMENTS=ISNULL(NULLIF(procattr3, ''), @TRICHOMONASVAGINALISCOMMENTS) from CaseProcedures where caseprocedureid =@icaseprocid END ELSE IF(LOWER(@procedureName) = 'candida species') BEGIN SET @isCandidaSpeciesadded = 'true' SELECT @CANDIDASPECIESRESULT = ISNULL(NULLIF(procattr1, ''), @CANDIDASPECIESRESULT),@CANDIDASPECIESCOMMENTS=ISNULL(NULLIF(procattr3, ''), @CANDIDASPECIESCOMMENTS) from CaseProcedures where caseprocedureid =@icaseprocid END ELSE IF(LOWER(@procedureName) = 'gardnerella vaginalis') BEGIN SET @isGardnerellaVaginalisadded = 'true' SELECT @GARDNERELLAVAGINALISRESULT = ISNULL(NULLIF(procattr1, ''), @GARDNERELLAVAGINALISRESULT),@GARDNERELLAVAGINALISCOMMENTS=ISNULL(NULLIF(procattr3, ''), @GARDNERELLAVAGINALISCOMMENTS) from CaseProcedures where caseprocedureid =@icaseprocid END ELSE IF(@procedureName = 'HSV 1&2' OR @procedureName = 'HPV 1 & 2' OR @procedureName = 'HSV 1+2') BEGIN SET @isHSV12added = 'true' SELECT @HSV1RESULT = ISNULL(NULLIF(procattr1, ''), @HSV1RESULT),@HSV2RESULT=ISNULL(NULLIF(procattr2, ''), @HSV2RESULT),@HSV12COMMENTS=ISNULL(NULLIF(procattr3, ''), @HSV12COMMENTS) from CaseProcedures where caseprocedureid =@icaseprocid END ELSE IF(LOWER(@procedureName) = 'Lactobacillus') BEGIN SET @isLactoisadded = 'true' SELECT @LACTOISRESULT = ISNULL(NULLIF(procattr1, ''), @LACTOISRESULT),@LACTOISCOMMENTS=ISNULL(NULLIF(procattr3, ''), @LACTOISCOMMENTS) from CaseProcedures where caseprocedureid =@icaseprocid END ELSE IF(LOWER(@procedureName) = 'Candida, Glabrata') BEGIN SET @isCandidaGlabrataisadded = 'true' SELECT @CANDIDAGLABRATAISRESULT = ISNULL(NULLIF(procattr1, ''), @CANDIDAGLABRATAISRESULT),@CANDIDAGLABRATAISCOMMENTS=ISNULL(NULLIF(procattr3, ''), @CANDIDAGLABRATAISCOMMENTS) from CaseProcedures where caseprocedureid =@icaseprocid END ELSE IF(LOWER(@procedureName) = 'Candida, Other') BEGIN SET @isCandidaOtherisadded = 'true' SELECT @CANDIDAOTHERISRESULT = ISNULL(NULLIF(procattr1, ''), @CANDIDAOTHERISRESULT),@CANDIDAOTHERISCOMMENTS=ISNULL(NULLIF(procattr3, ''), @CANDIDAOTHERISCOMMENTS) from CaseProcedures where caseprocedureid =@icaseprocid END ELSE IF(LOWER(@procedureName) = 'Candida albicans, tropicalis, dubliniesis + parapsilosis') BEGIN SET @isATDPisadded = 'true' SELECT @ATDPRESULT = ISNULL(NULLIF(procattr1, ''), @ATDPRESULT),@ATDPISCOMMENTS=ISNULL(NULLIF(procattr3, ''), @ATDPISCOMMENTS) from CaseProcedures where caseprocedureid =@icaseprocid END ELSE IF(LOWER(@procedureName) = 'Candida Group') BEGIN SET @isCandidaGroupisadded = 'true' SELECT @CANDIDAGROUPRESULT = ISNULL(NULLIF(procattr1, ''), @CANDIDAGROUPRESULT),@CANDIDAGROUPISCOMMENTS=ISNULL(NULLIF(procattr3, ''), @CANDIDAGROUPISCOMMENTS) from CaseProcedures where caseprocedureid =@icaseprocid END ELSE IF(LOWER(@procedureName) = 'Candida glabrata') BEGIN SET @isNewCandidaglabrataisadded= 'true' SELECT @NEWCANDIDAGLABRATARESULT = ISNULL(NULLIF(procattr1, ''), @NEWCANDIDAGLABRATARESULT),@NEWCANDIDAGLABRATAISCOMMENTS=ISNULL(NULLIF(procattr3, ''), @NEWCANDIDAGLABRATAISCOMMENTS) from CaseProcedures where caseprocedureid =@icaseprocid END ELSE IF(LOWER(@procedureName) = 'Candida krusei') BEGIN SET @isCandidakruseiisadded = 'true' SELECT @CANDIDAKRUSEIRESULT = ISNULL(NULLIF(procattr1, ''), @CANDIDAKRUSEIRESULT),@CANDIDAKRUSEIISCOMMENTS=ISNULL(NULLIF(procattr3, ''), @CANDIDAKRUSEIISCOMMENTS) from CaseProcedures where caseprocedureid =@icaseprocid END ELSE IF(LOWER(@procedureName) = 'Bacterial Vaginosis') BEGIN SET @isBacterialVaginosisisadded = 'true' SELECT @BACTERIALVAGINOSISISRESULT = ISNULL(NULLIF(procattr1, ''), @BACTERIALVAGINOSISISRESULT),@BACTERIALVAGINOSISISCOMMENTS=ISNULL(NULLIF(procattr3, ''), @BACTERIALVAGINOSISISCOMMENTS) from CaseProcedures where caseprocedureid =@icaseprocid END ELSE IF(LOWER(@procedureName) = 'Candida Vaginitis') BEGIN SET @isCANDIDAVAGINITISadded = 'true' SELECT @CANDIDAVAGINITISRESULT = ISNULL(NULLIF(procattr1, ''), @CANDIDAVAGINITISRESULT),@CANDIDAVAGINITISCOMMENTS=ISNULL(NULLIF(procattr3, ''), @CANDIDAVAGINITISCOMMENTS) from CaseProcedures where caseprocedureid =@icaseprocid END ELSE IF(LOWER(@procedureName) = 'SARS-Cov-2') BEGIN SET @isCOVID19U0001isadded = 'true' SELECT @COVID19U0001RESULT = ISNULL(NULLIF(procattr1, ''), @COVID19U0001RESULT), @COVID19U0001ISCOMMENTS=ISNULL(NULLIF(procattr3, ''), @COVID19U0001ISCOMMENTS) from CaseProcedures where caseprocedureid =@icaseprocid END ELSE IF(LOWER(@procedureName) = 'COVID-19') BEGIN SET @isCOVID19U0002isadded = 'true' SELECT @COVID19U0002RESULT = ISNULL(NULLIF(procattr1, ''), @COVID19U0002RESULT), @COVID19U0002ISCOMMENTS=ISNULL(NULLIF(procattr3, ''), @COVID19U0002ISCOMMENTS) from CaseProcedures where caseprocedureid =@icaseprocid END SELECT @icaseprocid = MIN(caseprocedureid) FROM Caseprocedures WHERE caseid = @iCaseID AND caseprocedureid > @icaseprocid and status NOT IN ('cancelled','Deleted') END
DECLARE @PositiveResult NVARCHAR(20) = 'False'
IF EXISTS( Select 1 From CaseProcedures Where procedurename IN ('CT','NG','CT/NG ','HPV 16/18/45','HPV 16/18','HPV 16 &18/45','HPV 16 & 18','HPV 16&18/45','Hybrid Capture (HPV)','HPV HR', 'trichomonas','trichomonas vaginalis','candida species','gardnerella vaginalis','HSV 1&2','HPV 1 & 2','HSV 1+2','Lactobacillus', 'Candida, Glabrata','Candida, Other','Candida Vaginitis','Bacterial Vaginosis') AND status NOT IN ('cancelled','Deleted') AND (procattr1='POSITIVE' OR procattr2 ='POSITIVE' OR procattr4 ='POSITIVE' OR procattr5 ='POSITIVE') AND caseid = @iCaseID ) BEGIN SET @PositiveResult = 'True' END
SELECT @casetype=casetype,@OrganizationID=LabOrgId,@LabAccountID=LabAccountId FROM cases WHERE caseid=@iCaseID
IF EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM AccountCasetypes WHERE accountid=@LabAccountID AND casetype=@casetype AND ISNULL(IsSkipGrossingStatus,0)=1) BEGIN SELECT @SkipGrossingStatus='true' END ELSE BEGIN IF EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM OrganizationAttributes where AttributeName='SkipGrossingStatus' AND AttributeType='SkipCaseStatus' AND AttributeContext=@casetype AND Organizationid IN (@OrganizationID) AND IsActive=1 ) BEGIN SELECT @SkipGrossingStatus = ISNULL(AttributeValue,'false') FROM OrganizationAttributes WHERE AttributeName='SkipGrossingStatus' AND AttributeType='SkipCaseStatus' AND AttributeContext=@casetype AND Organizationid IN (@OrganizationID) AND IsActive=1 END ELSE BEGIN SELECT @SkipGrossingStatus = ISNULL(AttributeValue,'false') FROM OrganizationAttributes WHERE AttributeName='SkipGrossingStatus' AND AttributeType='SkipCaseStatus' AND AttributeContext=@casetype AND Organizationid=-1 AND IsActive=1 END END
DECLARE @OrderedDate Datetime,@FirstsignOutDate Datetime
Select @OrderedDate = MAX(requesteddate) From Caseprocedures Where caseid = @iCaseID AND Isordered= 1 AND Status IN ('In Progress','Fulfilled')
SELECT @FirstsignOutDate = MIN(signdate) --, MAX(signdate) AS Signdate FROM CaseSignatures WHERE reportstatus IN ('final','Final with Supplemental') AND caseid = @iCaseID GROUP BY caseid
SELECT TOP 1 aLab.logo AS Logo, c.caseid, 1 AS RepeatHeader, 1 AS Spacer1, CASE RTRIM(ISNULL(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(250), c.ammendmentnotes), '')) WHEN '' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS AmmendmentNotesPresent, CASE RTRIM(ISNULL(ct.schematictemplate, '')) WHEN '' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS SchematicImagePresent, 1 AS SiteInformationNeeded, 1 AS DiagnosisPresent, CASE RTRIM(ISNULL(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(250), c.casecomments), '')) WHEN '' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS CaseCommentsPresent, CASE RTRIM(ISNULL(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(250), di.diagattr5), '')) WHEN '' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS NotesPresent, 1 AS GrossInformationPresent, c.Services, CASE WHEN (CASE WHEN ISNULL(C.reportstatus,'')<> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)=0 THEN 0 ELSE (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CaseSignatures cs WHERE cs.caseid = c.caseid) END AS SignaturesPresent, CASE WHEN Mcrogph.micrographid is NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS MicrographPresent, CASE WHEN aLab.organizationid = aPath.organizationid THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS DisplayTechServices, isnull(di.icd91,'')AS icd1 ,isnull(di.icd92,'') AS icd2,isnull(di.icd93,'') AS icd3,isnull(di.icd94,'') AS icd4, isnull(di.icd95,'')AS icd5 ,isnull(di.icd96,'') AS icd6,isnull(di.icd97,'') AS icd7,isnull(di.icd98,'') AS icd8, DBO.GETCPTCODES(@iCaseID) AS CptCodes, DBO.GETCPTCODESICD9CODES_PLUS(@iCaseID) AS CptCodesConfigured, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Diagnosis di --LEFT OUTER JOIN CaseDiagnosisTemplates CDT ON di.diagnosisID = CDT.diagnosisId --LEFT JOIN DiagnosisTemplates dt ON CDT.diagtemplateid = dt.diagtemplateid CROSS APPLY [dbo].[diagnosis.GetCommaSeperatedTemplateID](di.diagnosisID) AA LEFT JOIN Specimens sp ON di.caseid = sp.caseid AND di.sequence = sp.sequence INNER JOIN Sites si on sp.siteid=si.siteid INNER JOIN Sites psi on si.parentid=psi.siteid CROSS JOIN (SELECT count(*) AS TotalCount FROM Diagnosis WHERE caseid =@iCaseID) b WHERE di.caseid =@iCaseID AND psi.sitename = 'Cervical' AND AA.Diagnosisid= CONVERT(NVARCHAR,di.diagnosisID) ) AS SiteCount, ( SELECT NULLIF(uvdiagnosis, 'others') AS HeaderText FROM [dbo].[diagnosis.vw_ListDiagnosisInformationUVUC] WHERE caseid = @iCaseID ) AS HeaderText, CASE c.casetype WHEN 'Lower Gastrointestinal' THEN DBO.GETCLINICALOPTIONS(c.clinicalinfo) WHEN 'Gastrointestinal' THEN DBO.GETCLINICALOPTIONS(c.clinicalinfo) WHEN 'Upper Gastrointestinal' THEN DBO.GETCLINICALOPTIONS(c.clinicalinfo) WHEN 'GI Histology_Plus' THEN DBO.GETCLINICALOPTIONSFORGIP(c.clinicalinfo) ELSE c.clinicalinfo END AS clinicalhistory, DBO.GETRULEOUTOPTIONS(c.RuleoutOptions,c.casetype,c.LabOrgId) AS RuleoutOptions, CASE WHEN micrographid IS NULL THEN 'no' ELSE 'yes' END AS IsMicroGraphPresent, CASE CONVERT(BIT,sCount) WHEN 0 THEN 'NO' ELSE 'YES' END AS sMoreMG, DBO.GETFORMATTEDICDCODESFORGI (c.caseid) AS ICD9, aLab.clia, @ShowSchematicDisplay AS CanDisplayImage, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Micrographs WHERE caseid = @iCaseID AND Micrograph_Appear = 1) AS MicroGraphCount, [dbo].[udf_diagnosis.IsFishConfiguredForUCReflexFISH] (@iCaseID) AS FishConfigured, CASE @iPreviewReport WHEN 0 THEN [dbo].[cases.IsScreenTechInvolved] (@iCaseID) ELSE 0 END AS ScreeningTechnician, -- For Clinical Chemistry, validiting ScreenTech's involved acc to the 'Action Performed' CASE (SELECT TOP 1 '1' FROM Cases C INNER JOIN CaseAuditDetails CAD ON C.caseid = CAD.caseid INNER JOIN Users U ON CAD.userid = U.userid INNER JOIN UserAccountRoles UAR ON U.userid = UAR.userid WHERE C.caseid IN (@iCaseID) AND CAD.actionperformed = CASE WHEN C.casetype IN('Clinical Chemistry','Progensa PCA3') THEN 'Finalized' ELSE 'Modified Diagnosis' END /* Finalized is selected if case type is clinical chemistry. Modified by --Lokesh */ AND UAR.rolename IN ( 'Screening Technologist', 'Pathologist') ORDER BY CAD.auditid DESC) WHEN 1 THEN '1' ELSE '0' END AS ScreeningTechnician_CC, ISNULL(di.diagattr1, '') AS hematuria, ISNULL(@ShowScreenTechSignOnReport,0) AS ScreenTechConfig, CASE @AccountName WHEN 'Sophora Diagnostic Laboratory, Inc.' THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END AS ShowNewTechnicalServices, @ShowDetailBelowSignature AS ShowDetailBelowSignature , @ShowPreviousVersionTable AS ShowPreviousVersionTable, CASE WHEN @OrderedDate > @FirstsignOutDate THEN 'addendum' ELSE CASE @iPreviewReport WHEN 1 THEN @ReportCaseStatus ELSE @ReportStatus END END AS reportstatus, CASE RTRIM(ISNULL(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(250), c.AmendmentReason), '')) WHEN '' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END + CASE RTRIM(ISNULL(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(250), c.AddendumReason), '')) WHEN '' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END + CASE RTRIM(ISNULL(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(250), c.CorrectionReason), '')) WHEN '' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS RevisionReasonPresent, CASE RTRIM(ISNULL(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(250), c.AddendumNotes), '')) WHEN '' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS AddendumNotesPresent, dbo.[GetIHCStainText](@iCaseId) AS IHCStainText, di.diagattr1 AS fulldiagnosis, ( SELECT DISTINCT ExtAttrValue FROM Cases C INNER JOIN CaseProcedures cp ON C.caseid = cp.caseid AND CP.TestName = 'Hybrid Capture'
--INNER JOIN Procedures P ON cp.procedureid = P.procedureid --moved procedures from organization level to account level AND cp.procedurename = 'Hybrid Capture (HPV)' INNER JOIN VaEntityExtAttributes O ON (c.LabOrgId = O.EntityId OR C.OFOrgId = O.EntityId) WHERE ExtAttrName = 'Reports.HybridCaptureText' AND EntityId IN ( SELECT UAR.OrganizationId FROM Cases C INNER JOIN UserAccountRoles UAR ON C.CreatedBy = UAR.UserId WHERE C.CaseId IN ( @iCaseID ) ) AND cp.caseid IN ( @iCaseID ) AND cp.status IN ('fulfilled', 'IN Progress') ) AS HybridCaptureStainText, ( SELECT DISTINCT ExtAttrValue FROM Cases C INNER JOIN CaseProcedures cp ON C.caseid = cp.caseid AND (CP.TestName = 'PCR' OR CP.TestName = 'Gonorrhea')
--INNER JOIN Procedures P ON cp.procedureid = P.procedureid --moved procedures from organization level to account level AND cp.procedurename IN ('PCR Chlamydia', 'Gonorrhea') INNER JOIN VaEntityExtAttributes O ON (C.LabOrgId = O.EntityId OR C.OFOrgId = O.EntityId) WHERE ExtAttrName = 'Reports.PCRChlamydiaText' AND EntityId IN ( SELECT UAR.OrganizationId FROM Cases C INNER JOIN UserAccountRoles UAR ON C.CreatedBy = UAR.UserId WHERE C.CaseId IN ( @iCaseID ) ) AND cp.caseid IN ( @iCaseID ) AND cp.status IN ('fulfilled', 'IN Progress') ) AS PCRChlamydiaStainText, @CountSupp AS Supplementalpresent, CASE WHEN @OrderedDate > @FirstsignOutDate THEN REPLACE(C.Status,'Amendment','addendum') ELSE c.status END status, c.clinicalinfo, c.LmpDate, (SELECT FormattedDisplayName FROM Users WHERE userid = c.ScreenedBy) AS Cytotechnologist, (SELECT FormattedDisplayName FROM Users WHERE userid = c.CytoTechnologist) AS CytotechnologistGYNPAP, caPath.accountid AS pathaccountid, c.casetype, (SELECT count(caseid) FROM specimens WHERE caseid = @iCaseID AND ruleouts IS NOT null) AS RuleoutOptionsMFD, @HPVRESULT AS HPVHR, @HPVCOMMENTS AS HPVComments, CASE WHEN ISNULL(@HPV16RESULT,'') <> '' THEN @HPV16RESULT + ' FOR HPV 16' ELSE '' END AS HPV16, CASE WHEN ISNULL(@HPV18RESULT,'') <> '' THEN @HPV18RESULT + ' FOR HPV 18' ELSE '' END AS HPV18,
@HPV1618COMMENTS AS HPV1618Comments, @CTRESULT AS Chlamydia, @CTCOMMENTS AS ChlamydiaComments, @NGRESULT AS Gonorrhea, @NGCOMMENTS AS GonorrheaComments, @CTNGCOMMENTS AS CTNGComments, @TRICHOMONASRESULT AS TrichomonasResult, @TRICHOMONASCOMMENTS AS TrichomonasComments, @CANDIDASPECIESRESULT AS CandidaResult, @CANDIDASPECIESCOMMENTS AS CandidaComments, @GARDNERELLAVAGINALISRESULT AS GardnerellaVaginalisResult, @GARDNERELLAVAGINALISCOMMENTS AS GardnerellaVaginalisComments, @TRICHOMONASVAGINALISRESULT AS TrichomonasVaginalisResult, @TRICHOMONASVAGINALISCOMMENTS AS TrichomonasVaginalisComments, @isCTadded AS isCTadded, @isCTNGadded AS isCTNGadded, @isNGadded AS isNGadded, @isHPVadded AS isHPVadded, @isHPV1618added AS isHPV16added, @isTrichonomasadded AS isTrichonomasadded, @isCandidaSpeciesadded AS isCandidaSpeciesadded, @isGardnerellaVaginalisadded AS isGardnerellaVaginalisadded, @isTrichonomasVaginalisadded AS isTrichonomasVaginalisadded, @isHSV12added AS isHSV12added, @isLactoisadded AS isLactoisadded, @isCandidaGlabrataisadded AS isCandidaGlabrataisadded, @isCandidaOtherisadded AS isCandidaOtherisadded, @isATDPisadded AS isATDPisadded, @isCandidaGroupisadded AS isCandidaGroupisadded, @isCandidakruseiisadded AS isCandidakruseiisadded, @isNewCandidaglabrataisadded AS isNewCandidaglabrataisadded, @isBacterialVaginosisisadded AS isBacterialVaginosisisadded, @isCANDIDAVAGINITISadded AS isCANDIDAVAGINITISadded, @isCOVID19U0001isadded AS isCOVID19U0001isadded, @isCOVID19U0002isadded AS isCOVID19U0002isadded,
@HSV1RESULT AS HSV1RESULT, @HSV2RESULT AS HSV2RESULT, @HSV12COMMENTS AS HSV12COMMENTS, @LACTOISRESULT AS LACTOISRESULT, @LACTOISCOMMENTS AS LACTOISCOMMENTS, @CANDIDAGLABRATAISRESULT AS CANDIDAGLABRATAISRESULT, @CANDIDAGLABRATAISCOMMENTS AS CANDIDAGLABRATAISCOMMENTS, @CANDIDAOTHERISRESULT AS CANDIDAOTHERISRESULT, @CANDIDAOTHERISCOMMENTS AS CANDIDAOTHERISCOMMENTS, @ATDPRESULT AS ATDPRESULT, @ATDPISCOMMENTS AS ATDPISCOMMENTS, @CANDIDAGROUPRESULT AS CANDIDAGROUPRESULT, @CANDIDAGROUPISCOMMENTS AS CANDIDAGROUPISCOMMENTS, @NEWCANDIDAGLABRATARESULT AS NEWCANDIDAGLABRATARESULT , @NEWCANDIDAGLABRATAISCOMMENTS AS NEWCANDIDAGLABRATAISCOMMENTS , @CANDIDAKRUSEIRESULT AS CANDIDAKRUSEIRESULT, @CANDIDAKRUSEIISCOMMENTS AS CANDIDAKRUSEIISCOMMENTS, @BACTERIALVAGINOSISISRESULT AS BACTERIALVAGINOSISISRESULT, @BACTERIALVAGINOSISISCOMMENTS AS BACTERIALVAGINOSISISCOMMENTS, @CANDIDAVAGINITISRESULT AS CANDIDAVAGINITISRESULT, @CANDIDAVAGINITISCOMMENTS AS CANDIDAVAGINITISCOMMENTS, @ScreenedBy AS ScreenedBy, @SkipGrossingStatus AS SkipGrossingStatus, @PositiveResult AS PositiveResult, @COVID19U0001RESULT AS COVID19U0001RESULT, @COVID19U0001ISCOMMENTS AS COVID19U0001ISCOMMENTS, @COVID19U0002RESULT AS COVID19U0002RESULT, @COVID19U0002ISCOMMENTS AS COVID19U0002ISCOMMENTS, CASE WHEN [dbo].[GetAdequacyCodes](di.diagattr8) LIKE '%UNSAT%' THEN 'UNSAT' ELSE 'SAT' END AS adequacyType, @ShowRTFReport As ShowRTFReport, CASE WHEN @OrderedDate > @FirstsignOutDate THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END P4Addendum FROM Cases c INNER JOIN CaseTypes ct ON c.casetype = ct.casetype LEFT JOIN CaseAssignments caPath ON c.caseid = caPath.CaseId AND caPath.AssignmentType = 'Pathologist Account' AND (capath.signer is NULL or capath.signer = 0) LEFT JOIN Accounts aLab ON c.LabAccountId = aLab.AccountId LEFT JOIN Accounts aPath ON caPath.AccountId = aPath.AccountId LEFT JOIN Diagnosis di ON di.caseid = c.caseid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT top 1 micrographid, caseid FROM Micrographs WHERE caseid = @iCaseID AND Micrograph_Appear = 1 ) Mcrogph ON Mcrogph.caseid = c.caseid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CASE COUNT(*) WHEN 1 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS sCount, caseid FROM Micrographs WHERE caseid = @iCaseID GROUP BY caseid --HAVING COUNT(*)>1 )A ON A.caseid = C.caseid WHERE c.caseid = @iCaseID ORDER BY caPath.CaseAssignID;
--END TRY
--BEGIN CATCH -- EXECUTE usp_HandleError --END CATCH
END

Section.Name: CorrectionStatus_Header
Section.OnFormat:
CorrectionStatus_Header.Visible = false
IF LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "preliminary" OR LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "preliminary with supplemental" OR LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "pending sign-out" THEN FinalStatus_Header.Visible = false CorrectionStatus_Header.Visible = true
'lblCorrected.Text = "*** PRELIMINARY REPORT ***"
IF Supplementalpresent > 0 THEN lblCorrected.Text = "*** PRELIMINARY WITH SUPPLEMENTAL REPORT ***" ELSE lblCorrected.Text = "*** PRELIMINARY REPORT ***" ENDIF ELSEIF LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "amendment" OR LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "corrected" OR LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "addendum" OR LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "amendment with supplemental" OR LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "corrected with supplemental" OR LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "addendum with supplemental" OR LCASE(TRIM(status)) = "correction - pending sign-out" OR LCASE(TRIM(status)) = "amendment - pending sign-out" OR LCASE(TRIM(status)) = "addendum - pending sign-out" THEN FinalStatus_Header.Visible = false CorrectionStatus_Header.Visible = true
IF Supplementalpresent > 0 THEN IF LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "amendment" OR LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "amendment with supplemental" OR LCASE(TRIM(status)) = "amendment - pending sign-out" THEN lblCorrected.Text = "*** AMENDED WITH SUPPLEMENTAL REPORT ***" ELSEIF LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "corrected" OR LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "corrected with supplemental" OR LCASE(TRIM(status)) = "correction - pending sign-out" THEN lblCorrected.Text = "*** CORRECTED WITH SUPPLEMENTAL REPORT ***" ELSEIF LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "addendum" OR LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "addendum with supplemental" OR LCASE(TRIM(status)) = "addendum - pending sign-out" THEN lblCorrected.Text = "*** ADDENDUM WITH SUPPLEMENTAL REPORT ***" END IF ELSE IF LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "amendment" OR LCASE(TRIM(status)) = "amendment - pending sign-out" THEN lblCorrected.Text = "*** AMENDED REPORT ***" ELSEIF LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "corrected" OR LCASE(TRIM(status)) = "correction - pending sign-out" THEN lblCorrected.Text = "*** CORRECTED REPORT ***" ELSEIF LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "addendum" OR LCASE(TRIM(status)) = "addendum - pending sign-out" THEN lblCorrected.Text = "*** ADDENDUM REPORT ***" END IF ENDIF ENDIF
IF LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "final" OR LCASE(TRIM(status)) = "supplemental - pending acknowledgement" OR LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "review" OR LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "final with supplemental" OR LCASE(TRIM(status)) = "distribution complete" OR LCASE(TRIM(status)) = "archived" THEN CorrectionStatus_Header.Visible = false FinalStatus_Header.Visible = true ENDIF

Section.Name: FinalStatus_Header
Section.OnFormat:
FinalStatus_Header.Visible = false
IF LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "final" OR LCASE(TRIM(status)) = "supplemental - pending acknowledgement" THEN CorrectionStatus_Header.Visible = false FinalStatus_Header.Visible = true lblFinal.Text = "*** FINAL WITH SUPPLEMENTAL REPORT ***" ENDIF
IF LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "final" OR LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "review" OR LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "final with supplemental" OR LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "review with supplemental" OR LCASE(TRIM(status)) = "distribution complete" OR LCASE(TRIM(status)) = "archived" THEN CorrectionStatus_Header.Visible = false FinalStatus_Header.Visible = true IF Supplementalpresent > 0 THEN lblFinal.Text = "*** FINAL WITH SUPPLEMENTAL REPORT ***" ELSE 'lblFinal.Text = "*** FINAL REPORT ***" FinalStatus_Header.Visible = false ENDIF ENDIF

If SignaturesPresent > 0 Then ScreeningTechnicianSignCtrl1.Visible = false ScreeningTechnicianSignCtrl2.Visible = false SubReportSignatureCtl1.Visible = true IF ShowDetailBelowSignature = "false" THEN DiagnosisPresent_Footer.Visible = false CaseCommentsPresent_Footer.Visible = true ELSE DiagnosisPresent_Footer.Visible = false CaseCommentsPresent_Footer.Visible = true END IF Else ScreeningTechnicianSignCtrl1.Visible = false ScreeningTechnicianSignCtrl2.Visible = false SubReportSignatureCtl1.Visible = false End If Else ScreeningTechnicianSignCtrl1.Visible = false ScreeningTechnicianSignCtrl2.Visible = false ' SubReportSignatureCtl1.Visible = false END IF

IF LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "final" OR LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "review" OR LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "final with supplemental" OR LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "preliminary" OR LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "amendment" OR LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "corrected" OR LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "addendum" OR LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "amendment with supplemental" OR LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "corrected with supplemental" OR LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "addendum with supplemental" OR LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "preliminary with supplemental" OR LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "review with supplemental" OR LCASE(TRIM(status)) = "amendment - pending sign-out" OR LCASE(TRIM(status)) = "correction - pending sign-out" OR LCASE(TRIM(status)) = "archived" OR LCASE(TRIM(status)) = "addendum - pending sign-out" OR LCASE(TRIM(status)) = "supplemental - pending acknowledgement" OR LCASE(TRIM(status)) = "distribution complete" THEN TitleLbl.Text = IIF(LCASE(TRIM((Services))) = "consult", OtherCaseTypeName & " Consult Report", OtherCaseTypeName & " Report") ENDIF

DataSource.RecordSource:
Select * INTO #Bacteria FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT CP.Caseid, ResultName, Attributename, CP.Procedurename, CASE WHEN TR.Flag = 'notdetected' THEN 'NOT DETECTED' ELSE UPPER(TR.Flag) END AS Flag FROM TestResults TR INNER JOIN Cases C ON C.caseid = TR.caseid INNER JOIN CaseProcedures CP ON TR.Caseid = CP.Caseid AND TR.caseprocedureid = CP.caseprocedureid LEFT JOIN OrganizationAttributes OA ON OA.AttributeValue = CAST(TR.Resultcodeid AS NVARCHAR) AND attributetype = 'GeneAntibioticMapping' AND OA.ISactive = 1 AND C.casetype = AttributeContext AND OA.Organizationid = C.LabOrgid WHERE Cp.Status NOT IN ('Cancelled','Deleted') AND TR.ResultStatus NOT IN ('Cancelled','Deleted') AND ISNULL(NULLIF(TR.isReportable,''),1) = 1 AND CP.Caseid = -9999 AND CP.procedurename NOT IN ('Controls') AND CAST(TR.Resultcodeid AS NVARCHAR) NOT IN (SELECT AttributeValue FROM OrganizationAttributes OA WHERE Attributetype = 'ResultsGroup' AND OA.ISactive = 1 AND C.casetype = AttributeContext AND OA.Organizationid = C.LabOrgid AND AttributeName = 'Controls') ) A
DECLARE @MOLECULARResult NVARCHAR(20) = 'False' IF EXISTS (SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM #Bacteria WHERE Flag = 'DETECTED' AND Procedurename != 'ABR Genes') BEGIN SET @MOLECULARResult = 'True' END
Select @MOLECULARResult AS TestStatus, CASE WHEN @MOLECULARResult = 'True' THEN 'TEST RESULT – POSITIVE' ELSE 'TEST RESULT – NEGATIVE' END TestResult ,Caseid from cases where caseid=-9999
DROP TABLE #Bacteria

Section.OnFormat: IF TestStatus = "True" THEN Field1.BackColor = "White" fldTestValue1.ForeColor = "Red" ELSE Field1.BackColor = "White" fldTestValue1.ForeColor = "Black" END IF

DataSource.RecordSource:
Select * INTO #Bacteria FROM (
SELECT DISTINCT CP.Caseid, ResultName AS TestName, Attributename, CP.Procedurename, CASE WHEN NULLIF(a.b.value('@Value','Nvarchar(MAX)'),'') IS NOT NULL AND AttributeName IN ('COVID-19') THEN a.b.value('@Value','Nvarchar(MAX)') ELSE UPPER(ISNULL(TR.Flag,'Pending')) END AS Flag, UPPER(ISNULL(TR.Flag,'Pending')) FlagNew FROM (Select CAST(CustomResults AS XML) AS xmlname ,* From TestResults) TR INNER JOIN Cases C ON C.caseid = TR.caseid INNER JOIN CaseProcedures CP ON TR.Caseid = CP.Caseid AND TR.caseprocedureid = CP.caseprocedureid INNER JOIN OrganizationAttributes OA ON OA.AttributeValue = CAST(TR.Resultcodeid AS NVARCHAR) AND attributetype = 'ResultsGroup' AND OA.ISactive = 1 AND C.casetype = AttributeContext AND OA.Organizationid = C.LabOrgid OUTER APPLY xmlname.nodes('Properties/Property') a(b) WHERE Cp.Status NOT IN ('Cancelled','Deleted') AND TR.ResultStatus NOT IN ('Cancelled','Deleted') AND ISNULL(NULLIF(TR.isReportable,''),1) = 1 AND CP.Caseid = -9999 AND CP.procedurename NOT IN ('Controls') AND CAST(TR.Resultcodeid AS NVARCHAR) NOT IN (SELECT AttributeValue FROM OrganizationAttributes OA WHERE Attributetype = 'ResultsGroup' AND OA.ISactive = 1 AND C.casetype = AttributeContext AND OA.Organizationid = C.LabOrgid AND AttributeName = 'Controls') ) A
DECLARE @COVIDResult NVARCHAR(50),@COVIDTestName NVARCHAR(255) SELECT TOP 1 @COVIDResult = Flag,@COVIDTestName = TestName FROM #Bacteria WHERE AttributeName IN ('COVID-19')
DECLARE @RPiDResult NVARCHAR(20) SELECT TOP 1 @RPiDResult = FlagNew FROM #Bacteria WHERE AttributeName IN ('Viruses','Bacteria') ORDER BY FlagNew ASC
SELECT CASE WHEN LEN(@COVIDResult) > 0 THEN COVIDResult ELSE '' END COVIDResult, CASE WHEN LEN(@RPiDResult) > 0 THEN RPiDResult ELSE '' END RPiDResult,Caseid FROM ( SELECT Caseid, CASE WHEN @COVIDResult = 'DETECTED' THEN ' \cf1 '+@COVIDTestName+':'+' '+'\cf2 '+'POSITIVE ' WHEN @COVIDResult = 'NOTDETECTED' THEN ' \cf1 '+@COVIDTestName+':'+' '+'\cf3 '+'NEGATIVE ' ELSE ' \cf1 '+@COVIDTestName+':'+' '+'\cf1 '+@COVIDResult+' ' END COVIDResult, @COVIDTestName+':' COVIDTestName,'RPID Panel:' AS RPiDTestName, CASE WHEN @RPiDResult = 'DETECTED' THEN ' \cf1 '+'RPiD Panel:'+' '+'\cf2 '+'POSITIVE ' WHEN @RPiDResult = 'NOTDETECTED' THEN ' \cf1 '+'RPiD Panel:'+' '+'\cf3 '+'NEGATIVE ' WHEN @RPiDResult = 'PENDING' THEN ' \cf1 '+'RPiD Panel:'+' '+'\cf1 '+'\i PENDING \i0'+' ' ELSE ' \cf1 '+'RPiD Panel:'+' '+'\cf1 '+@RPiDResult+' ' END RPiDResult FROM Cases WHERE Caseid = -9999 )A
--Select TOP 1 @MOLECULARResult AS TestStatus, @RPiDResult AS RPiDResult,CASE WHEN @RPiDResult = 'True' THEN CASE WHEN FlagNew = 'INCONCLUSIVE' THEN 'zzz' ELSE FlagNew END ELSE FlagNew END AS Flagnew, --CASE WHEN @MOLECULARResult = 'True' THEN 'POSITIVE' ELSE Flag END TestResult ,Caseid from #Bacteria --ORDER BY CASE WHEN @RPiDResult = 'True' THEN CASE WHEN FlagNew = 'INCONCLUSIVE' THEN 'zzz' ELSE FlagNew END ELSE FlagNew END ASC
DROP TABLE #Bacteria

="{\rtf1{\colortbl;\red35\green35\blue176;\red255\green0\blue0;\red82\green129\blue53;\red255\green0\blue0;\red128\green0\blue0;\red0\green0\blue128;\red128\green128\blue0;\red128\green0\blue128;\red255\green0\blue0;\red192\green192\blue192;\red0\green128\blue128;\red255\green255\blue0;}\qc"+" "+"{\fonttbl{\f0 "+PrelimCtl1.Font.Name+";}}\fs"+ROUND(PrelimCtl1.Font.Size, 0) * 2+ " \cf1 " + "UTiD Result:"+" "+"\cf3"+"NEGATIVE" +"\qc}" END IF

DataSource.RecordSource:
IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb.dbo.#fishdummy1', 'U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #fishdummy1;
CREATE TABLE #fishdummy1 (CDFName VARCHAR(max), CDFDispalayValue VARCHAR(max),CDFType VARCHAR(max), CDFLabel VARCHAR(max))
DECLARE @xml_var XML SET @xml_var = ( select CustomControlData from cases where caseid=-9999 and CustomControlData is not null
)
DECLARE @CDFName VARCHAR(1000), @CDFDispalayValue VARCHAR(1000), @CDFType VARCHAR(1000), @CDFLabel VARCHAR(1000)
INSERT INTO #fishdummy1(CDFName,CDFDispalayValue,CDFType,CDFLabel) SELECT * FROM ( SELECT Tbl.Col.value('@CDFName', 'varchar(1000)') as CDFName, Tbl.Col.value('@CDFDisplayValue', 'varchar(1000)') as CDFDispalayValue, Tbl.Col.value('@CDFType', 'varchar(1000)') as CDFType, Tbl.Col.value('@CDFLabel', 'varchar(1000)') as CDFLabel FROM @xml_var.nodes('//Data') Tbl(Col) )a
SELECT CDF.TestName AS CDFName,Case when CDF.Result='NOTDETECTED' THEN 'NOT DETECTED' ELSE CDF.Result END Results, ISNULL(CP.OtherProcedureName,CP.ProcedureName) AS TestName FROM CaseProcedures CP --INNER JOIN Procedures P ON CP.procedureid = P.procedureid AND CP.testid = P.testid LEFT JOIN (Select REPLACE(cdfname,'result','') TestName,CDFDispalayValue as Result,LTRIM(RTRIM(REPLACE(CDFLabel,'result',''))) AS CDFLabel from #fishdummy1 ) CDF ON ISNULL(CP.OtherProcedureName,CP.ProcedureName)=CDFLabel WHERE CP.caseid = -9999 AND (CP.status = 'Fulfilled' or CP.status='In Progress') and ISNULL(CP.OtherProcedureName,CP.ProcedureName) IN ('Campylobacter','Clostridium difficile, Toxin A/B','Clostridium difficule, Toxin A/B','Enterotoxigenic E.coli (ETEC) LT/ST', 'Escherichia coli O 157','Salmonella','Shiga-like Toxin producing E. coli (STEC) stx 1/stx 2','Shigo-like Toxin producing E. coli (STEC) stx 1/stx 2','Shigella','Shigello','Vibro cholerae','Vibro cholera', 'Vibro cholera','Vibrio cholerae')

Section.OnFormat: IF Results = "DETECTED" THEN grossdescriptionLbl2.BackColor = "Red" grossdescriptionLbl2.ForeColor = "White" grossdescriptionLbl2.BorderColor = "Black" SiteLbl2.BackColor = "Red" SiteLbl2.ForeColor = "White" SiteLbl2.BorderColor = "Black" ELSE grossdescriptionLbl2.BackColor = "White" grossdescriptionLbl2.ForeColor = "Black" grossdescriptionLbl2.BorderColor = "Black" SiteLbl2.BackColor = "White" SiteLbl2.ForeColor = "Black" SiteLbl2.BorderColor = "Black" END IF

-- ============================================= -- Author: Jayanth B N -- Alter date: 2010-12-22 -- Description: Get Revision Reason Report Details -- Modified on 15-6-2011 By Srivats HC : Changed the approach as the reasons were not fetched in proper order if the case was discontinued -- from a revision at least once. -- ============================================= --CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[usp_GetAuditRevisionReasons] -- ( DECLARE @iCaseID BIGINT = -9999 -- ) --AS BEGIN -- SET NOCOUNT ON added to prevent extra result sets from -- interfering with SELECT statements. SET NOCOUNT ON; BEGIN TRY DECLARE @OrderedDate Datetime,@FirstsignOutDate Datetime Select @OrderedDate = MAX(requesteddate) From Caseprocedures Where caseid = @iCaseID AND Isordered= 1 AND Status IN ('In Progress','Fulfilled') SELECT @FirstsignOutDate = MIN(signdate) --, MAX(signdate) AS Signdate FROM CaseSignatures WHERE reportstatus IN ('final','Final with Supplemental') AND caseid = @iCaseID GROUP BY caseid DECLARE @reasonsTable TABLE ( actionperformed VARCHAR(500), id BIGINT, AuditRevisionNotes VARCHAR(MAX), AuditDate datetime, UserName varchar(100) ) DECLARE @Reason VARCHAR(MAX) --Get Amendment Reasons and add it to the temp table SELECT @Reason = AmendmentReason FROM Cases WHERE caseid = @iCaseID IF(ISNULL(@Reason,'') != '') BEGIN INSERT INTO @reasonsTable (actionperformed,id,AuditRevisionNotes,AuditDate,UserName) SELECT CASE WHEN @OrderedDate > @FirstsignOutDate THEN 'Revised as Addendum' ELSE 'Revised as Amendment' END,Id,DBO.GetAuditRevisionReasons('Revised as Amendment',@iCaseID,Id,NULL), DBO.GetAuditRevisionReasonsTime('Revised as Amendment',@iCaseID,id,NULL), SUBSTRING(Data, CHARINDEX('[',Data) + 1, charindex(']', Data) - CHARINDEX('[',Data) - 20 ) FROM Split(@Reason,'
') END --Get Addendum Reasons and add it to the temp table SELECT @Reason = AddendumReason FROM Cases WHERE caseid = @iCaseID IF(ISNULL(@Reason,'') != '') BEGIN INSERT INTO @reasonsTable (actionperformed,id,AuditRevisionNotes,AuditDate,UserName) SELECT 'Revised as Addendum',Id,DBO.GetAuditRevisionReasons('Revised as Addendum',@iCaseID,Id,NULL), DBO.GetAuditRevisionReasonsTime('Revised as Addendum',@iCaseID,id,NULL) , SUBSTRING(Data, CHARINDEX('[',Data) + 1, charindex(']', Data) - CHARINDEX('[',Data) - 20 ) FROM Split(@Reason,'
') END --Get Correction Reasons and add it to the temp table SELECT @Reason = CorrectionReason FROM Cases WHERE caseid = @iCaseID IF(ISNULL(@Reason,'') != '') BEGIN INSERT INTO @reasonsTable (actionperformed,id,AuditRevisionNotes,AuditDate,UserName) SELECT 'Revised as Correction',Id,DBO.GetAuditRevisionReasons('Revised as Correction',@iCaseID,Id,NULL), DBO.GetAuditRevisionReasonsTime('Revised as Correction',@iCaseID,id,NULL), SUBSTRING(Data, CHARINDEX('[',Data) + 1, charindex(']', Data) - CHARINDEX('[',Data) - 20 ) FROM Split(@Reason,'
') END SELECT actionperformed,@iCaseID AS caseid,id,AuditRevisionNotes, CONVERT(VARCHAR(2),DATEPART(m,AuditDate)) +'/' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(2),DATEPART(D,AuditDate)) + '/' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(4),DATEPART(YYYY,AuditDate)) + ' ' + RIGHT(LTRIM(RIGHT(CONVERT(varchar,AuditDate,100),8)),8) AS AuditDate,UserName FROM @reasonsTable R ORDER BY R.AuditDate DESC --SELECT actionperformed, Caseid, auditid, userid, RowNO, AuditRevisionNotes, CASE WHEN LEN(AuditMONTH) = 1 THEN '0' + AuditMONTH ELSE AuditMONTH END + --'/' + CASE WHEN LEN(AuditDay) = 1 THEN '0' + AuditDay ELSE AuditDay END + '/' + AuditYEAR + ' ' + AuditTime AS AuditDate, UserName FROM -- ( --SELECT *, -- ( -- SELECT DBO.GetAuditRevisionReasons(actionperformed,Caseid,RowNO)) AuditRevisionNotes, -- CONVERT(NVARCHAR(20),DAY((SELECT DBO.GetAuditRevisionReasonsTime(actionperformed,Caseid,RowNO)))) AS AuditDay, -- CONVERT(NVARCHAR(20),MONTH((SELECT DBO.GetAuditRevisionReasonsTime(actionperformed,Caseid,RowNO)))) AS AuditMONTH, -- CONVERT(NVARCHAR(20),YEAR((SELECT DBO.GetAuditRevisionReasonsTime(actionperformed,Caseid,RowNO)))) AS AuditYEAR, -- right(convert(char(19),(SELECT DBO.GetAuditRevisionReasonsTime(actionperformed,Caseid,RowNO)),100),7) AS AuditTime, -- (select FormattedDisplayName from Users where userid = A.userid) AS UserName -- FROM -- ( -- SELECT actionperformed, Caseid, auditid, userid, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY actionperformed ORDER BY auditid desc) AS RowNO -- FROM CaseAuditDetails -- WHERE caseid=@iCaseID AND (actionperformed = 'Revised As Correction' OR actionperformed = 'Revised As Amendment' -- OR actionperformed = 'Revised As Addendum') -- )A -- )B WHERE AuditRevisionNotes <> '' ORDER BY auditid DESC END TRY BEGIN CATCH EXECUTE usp_HandleError END CATCH END

Section.Name: Detail
Section.OnFormat: If LCASE(TRIM(actionperformed)) = "revised as amendment" Then FLAmendmentReason.Value = "Amendment Reason: " + Trim(AuditRevisionNotes) + " - " + UserName + ": " + auditdate 'Format( auditdate, "MM/dd/yyyy") + " " + Format( auditdate, "hh:mm tt") ElseIf LCASE(TRIM(actionperformed)) = "revised as addendum" Then FLAmendmentReason.Value = "Addendum Reason: " + Trim(AuditRevisionNotes) + " - " + UserName + ": " + auditdate 'Format( auditdate, "MM/dd/yyyy") + " " + Format( auditdate, "hh:mm tt") ElseIf LCASE(TRIM(actionperformed)) = "revised as correction" Then FLAmendmentReason.Value = "Correction Reason: " + Trim(AuditRevisionNotes) + " - " + UserName + ": " + auditdate 'Format( auditdate, "MM/dd/yyyy") + " " + Format( auditdate, "hh:mm tt") EndIF
Section.OnPrint: a = Replace(Report.Tag, "TotlaHeight:", "") a = Detail.RenderHeight + a Report.Tag = "TotalHeight:" & a

-- ============================================= -- Author: Jayanth B N -- Alter date: 2010-12-22 -- Description: Get Revision Reason Report Details -- Modified on 15-6-2011 By Srivats HC : Changed the approach as the reasons were not fetched in proper order if the case was discontinued -- from a revision at least once. -- ============================================= --CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[usp_GetAuditRevisionReasons] -- ( DECLARE @iCaseID BIGINT = -9999 -- ) --AS BEGIN -- SET NOCOUNT ON added to prevent extra result sets from -- interfering with SELECT statements. SET NOCOUNT ON; BEGIN TRY DECLARE @OrderedDate Datetime,@FirstsignOutDate Datetime Select @OrderedDate = MAX(requesteddate) From Caseprocedures Where caseid = @iCaseID AND Isordered= 1 AND Status IN ('In Progress','Fulfilled') SELECT @FirstsignOutDate = MIN(signdate) --, MAX(signdate) AS Signdate FROM CaseSignatures WHERE reportstatus IN ('final','Final with Supplemental') AND caseid = @iCaseID GROUP BY caseid DECLARE @reasonsTable TABLE ( actionperformed VARCHAR(500), id BIGINT, AuditRevisionNotes VARCHAR(MAX), AuditDate datetime, UserName varchar(100) ) DECLARE @Reason VARCHAR(MAX) --Get Amendment Reasons and add it to the temp table SELECT @Reason = AmendmentReason FROM Cases WHERE caseid = @iCaseID IF(ISNULL(@Reason,'') != '') BEGIN INSERT INTO @reasonsTable (actionperformed,id,AuditRevisionNotes,AuditDate,UserName) SELECT CASE WHEN @OrderedDate > @FirstsignOutDate THEN 'Revised as Addendum' ELSE 'Revised as Amendment' END,Id,DBO.GetAuditRevisionReasons('Revised as Amendment',@iCaseID,Id,NULL), DBO.GetAuditRevisionReasonsTime('Revised as Amendment',@iCaseID,id,NULL), SUBSTRING(Data, CHARINDEX('[',Data) + 1, charindex(']', Data) - CHARINDEX('[',Data) - 20 ) FROM Split(@Reason,'
') END --Get Addendum Reasons and add it to the temp table SELECT @Reason = AddendumReason FROM Cases WHERE caseid = @iCaseID IF(ISNULL(@Reason,'') != '') BEGIN INSERT INTO @reasonsTable (actionperformed,id,AuditRevisionNotes,AuditDate,UserName) SELECT 'Revised as Addendum',Id,DBO.GetAuditRevisionReasons('Revised as Addendum',@iCaseID,Id,NULL), DBO.GetAuditRevisionReasonsTime('Revised as Addendum',@iCaseID,id,NULL) , SUBSTRING(Data, CHARINDEX('[',Data) + 1, charindex(']', Data) - CHARINDEX('[',Data) - 20 ) FROM Split(@Reason,'
') END --Get Correction Reasons and add it to the temp table SELECT @Reason = CorrectionReason FROM Cases WHERE caseid = @iCaseID IF(ISNULL(@Reason,'') != '') BEGIN INSERT INTO @reasonsTable (actionperformed,id,AuditRevisionNotes,AuditDate,UserName) SELECT 'Revised as Correction',Id,DBO.GetAuditRevisionReasons('Revised as Correction',@iCaseID,Id,NULL), DBO.GetAuditRevisionReasonsTime('Revised as Correction',@iCaseID,id,NULL), SUBSTRING(Data, CHARINDEX('[',Data) + 1, charindex(']', Data) - CHARINDEX('[',Data) - 20 ) FROM Split(@Reason,'
') END SELECT actionperformed,@iCaseID AS caseid,id,AuditRevisionNotes, CONVERT(VARCHAR(2),DATEPART(m,AuditDate)) +'/' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(2),DATEPART(D,AuditDate)) + '/' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(4),DATEPART(YYYY,AuditDate)) + ' ' + RIGHT(LTRIM(RIGHT(CONVERT(varchar,AuditDate,100),8)),8) AS AuditDate,UserName FROM @reasonsTable R ORDER BY R.AuditDate DESC --SELECT actionperformed, Caseid, auditid, userid, RowNO, AuditRevisionNotes, CASE WHEN LEN(AuditMONTH) = 1 THEN '0' + AuditMONTH ELSE AuditMONTH END + --'/' + CASE WHEN LEN(AuditDay) = 1 THEN '0' + AuditDay ELSE AuditDay END + '/' + AuditYEAR + ' ' + AuditTime AS AuditDate, UserName FROM -- ( --SELECT *, -- ( -- SELECT DBO.GetAuditRevisionReasons(actionperformed,Caseid,RowNO)) AuditRevisionNotes, -- CONVERT(NVARCHAR(20),DAY((SELECT DBO.GetAuditRevisionReasonsTime(actionperformed,Caseid,RowNO)))) AS AuditDay, -- CONVERT(NVARCHAR(20),MONTH((SELECT DBO.GetAuditRevisionReasonsTime(actionperformed,Caseid,RowNO)))) AS AuditMONTH, -- CONVERT(NVARCHAR(20),YEAR((SELECT DBO.GetAuditRevisionReasonsTime(actionperformed,Caseid,RowNO)))) AS AuditYEAR, -- right(convert(char(19),(SELECT DBO.GetAuditRevisionReasonsTime(actionperformed,Caseid,RowNO)),100),7) AS AuditTime, -- (select FormattedDisplayName from Users where userid = A.userid) AS UserName -- FROM -- ( -- SELECT actionperformed, Caseid, auditid, userid, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY actionperformed ORDER BY auditid desc) AS RowNO -- FROM CaseAuditDetails -- WHERE caseid=@iCaseID AND (actionperformed = 'Revised As Correction' OR actionperformed = 'Revised As Amendment' -- OR actionperformed = 'Revised As Addendum') -- )A -- )B WHERE AuditRevisionNotes <> '' ORDER BY auditid DESC END TRY BEGIN CATCH EXECUTE usp_HandleError END CATCH END

DataSource.RecordSource: SELECT DISTINCT CP.Caseid, UPPER(ResultName) AS Testname, CASE WHEN TR.Flag = 'notdetected' THEN 'NOT DETECTED' ELSE UPPER(TR.Flag) END AS Results, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (Order BY CP.Caseid) As SlNo,NTILE(2) OVER (ORDER BY CP.Caseid,ResultName) as RowNo FROM TestResults TR INNER JOIN Cases C ON C.Caseid = TR.Caseid INNER JOIN CaseProcedures CP ON TR.Caseid = CP.Caseid AND TR.caseprocedureid = CP.caseprocedureid INNER JOIN OrganizationAttributes OA ON OA.AttributeValue = CAST(TR.Resultcodeid AS NVARCHAR) AND attributetype = 'ResultsGroup' AND OA.ISactive = 1 ANd AttributeName = 'Viruses' AND C.casetype = AttributeContext AND OA.Organizationid = C.LabOrgid WHERE CP.Procedurename != 'ABR Genes' AND Cp.Status NOT IN ('Cancelled','Deleted') AND TR.ResultStatus NOT IN ('Cancelled','Deleted') AND ISNULL(NULLIF(TR.isReportable,''),1) = 1 AND CP.Caseid = -9999 --AND ResultName IN ('Adenovirus','Coronavirus HKU1','Coronavirus NL63','Coronavirus 229E','Coronavirus OC43','Human Metapneumovirus', --'Human Rhinovirus/Enterovirus','Influenza A','Influenza A/H1','Influenza A/H1-2009','Influenza A/H3','Influenza B', --'Parainfluenza 1','Parainfluenza 2','Parainfluenza 3','Parainfluenza 4','Respiratory Syncytial Virus')

END IF

DataSource.RecordSource:
;WITH CTE AS ( SELECT DISTINCT CP.Caseid, ResultName, Attributename, CP.Procedurename, CASE WHEN TR.Flag = 'notdetected' THEN 'NOT DETECTED' ELSE UPPER(TR.Flag) END AS Flag FROM TestResults TR INNER JOIN Cases C ON C.caseid = TR.caseid INNER JOIN CaseProcedures CP ON TR.Caseid = CP.Caseid AND TR.caseprocedureid = CP.caseprocedureid INNER JOIN OrganizationAttributes OA ON OA.AttributeValue = CAST(TR.Resultcodeid AS NVARCHAR) AND attributetype = 'ResultsGroup' AND OA.ISactive = 1 AND C.casetype = AttributeContext AND OA.Organizationid = C.LabOrgid WHERE Cp.Status NOT IN ('Cancelled','Deleted') AND TR.ResultStatus NOT IN ('Cancelled','Deleted') AND ISNULL(NULLIF(TR.isReportable,''),1) = 1 AND CP.Caseid = -9999 AND CP.procedurename NOT IN ('Controls') AND CAST(TR.Resultcodeid AS NVARCHAR) NOT IN (SELECT AttributeValue FROM OrganizationAttributes OA WHERE Attributetype = 'ResultsGroup' AND OA.ISactive = 1 AND C.casetype = AttributeContext AND OA.Organizationid = C.LabOrgid AND AttributeName = 'Controls') )
SELECT DISTINCT Caseid,'Pathogens Tested:' As Tested, STUFF((SELECT distinct ', ' + p1.ResultName FROM CTE p1 WHERE p.Caseid = p1.Caseid AND p1.Flag = 'NOT DETECTED' AND AttributeName NOT IN ('COVID-19') FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE ).value('.', 'NVARCHAR(MAX)') ,1,1,'') AS ResultName FROM CTE p WHERE p.Flag = 'NOT DETECTED' AND AttributeName NOT IN ('COVID-19')

Field.Name: SiteLbl1
Field.Text: The organisms listed above are part of the panel and tested for this patient but were not detected.

DataSource.RecordSource:
SELECT * INTO #table From ( SELECT DISTINCT CP.Caseid, UPPER(ResultName) AS Testname,AttributeName, CASE WHEN TR.Flag = 'notdetected' THEN 'NONE DETECTED' ELSE UPPER(ISNULL(TR.Flag,'PENDING')) END AS Results, --a.b.value('@Value','Nvarchar(MAX)') AS Value, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (Order BY CP.Caseid) As SlNo,NTILE(2) OVER (ORDER BY CP.Caseid,ResultName) as RowNo , CP.caseprocedureid ,ISNULL(TR.Sequence,TR.Resultid) as Sno, CASE WHEN UPPER(ResultName) IN ('INFLUENZA A H1','INFLUENZA A H1N1PDM09','INFLUENZA A H3','INFLUENZA A/H1-2009','INFLUENZA A/H3') THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS TestAlignment FROM (Select CAST(CustomResults AS XML) AS xmlname ,* From TestResults) TR INNER JOIN Cases C ON C.Caseid = TR.Caseid INNER JOIN CaseProcedures CP ON TR.Caseid = CP.Caseid AND TR.caseprocedureid = CP.caseprocedureid INNER JOIN OrganizationAttributes OA ON OA.AttributeValue = CAST(TR.Resultcodeid AS NVARCHAR) AND attributetype = 'ResultsGroup' AND OA.ISactive = 1 ANd AttributeName IN ('Viruses','Bacteria') AND C.casetype = AttributeContext AND OA.Organizationid = C.LabOrgid --CROSS APPLY xmlname.nodes('Properties/Property') a(b) WHERE CP.Procedurename != 'ABR Genes' AND Cp.Status NOT IN ('Cancelled','Deleted') AND TR.ResultStatus NOT IN ('Cancelled','Deleted') AND ISNULL(NULLIF(TR.isReportable,''),1) = 1 AND CP.Caseid = -9999 --AND ResultName IN ('Adenovirus','Coronavirus HKU1','Coronavirus NL63','Coronavirus 229E','Coronavirus OC43','Human Metapneumovirus', --'Human Rhinovirus/Enterovirus','Influenza A','Influenza A/H1','Influenza A/H1-2009','Influenza A/H3','Influenza B', --'Parainfluenza 1','Parainfluenza 2','Parainfluenza 3','Parainfluenza 4','Respiratory Syncytial Virus') )A
IF EXISTS (Select 1 FROM #table Where Results = 'DETECTED') BEGIN Select * From #table Where Results = 'DETECTED' ORDER BY AttributeName,Testname END ELSE BEGIN Select TOP 1 'RPiD Panel' Testname,Results,'No' TestAlignment From #table ORDER BY Results END
DROP TABLE #table

Section.Name: Detail
Section.OnFormat:
IF Results = "DETECTED" THEN grossdescriptionLbl2.ForeColor = "Red" grossdescriptionLbl2.Font.Bold = True SiteLbl2.ForeColor = "Red" ELSEIF Results = "NONE DETECTED" THEN grossdescriptionLbl2.ForeColor = "Green" grossdescriptionLbl2.Font.Bold = True SiteLbl2.ForeColor = "Black" ELSE grossdescriptionLbl2.ForeColor = "Black" grossdescriptionLbl2.Font.Bold = False SiteLbl2.ForeColor = "Black" END IF
IF TestAlignment = "Yes" THEN SiteLbl2.Left = 275 SiteLbl2.Width = 3975 SiteLbl2.Font.Italic = True IF Results = "DETECTED" THEN SiteLbl2.ForeColor = "Red" ELSE SiteLbl2.ForeColor = "DimGray" ENDIF ELSE SiteLbl2.Left = 75 SiteLbl2.Width = 4175 SiteLbl2.Font.Italic = False IF Results = "DETECTED" THEN SiteLbl2.ForeColor = "Red" ELSE SiteLbl2.ForeColor = "Black" ENDIF END IF

DataSource.RecordSource: SELECT DISTINCT CP.Caseid, ResultName AS Testname, --CASE WHEN NULLIF(a.b.value('@Value','Nvarchar(MAX)'),'') IS NOT NULL THEN a.b.value('@Value','Nvarchar(MAX)') CASE WHEN TR.Flag = 'notdetected' THEN ' NOT Detected' When TR.Flag = 'Detected' then ' POSITIVE' ELSE UPPER(ISNULL(TR.Flag,'PENDING')) END AS Results, -- a.b.value('@Value','Nvarchar(MAX)') AS Value, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (Order BY CP.Caseid) As SlNo,NTILE(2) OVER (ORDER BY CP.Caseid,ResultName) as RowNo , CP.caseprocedureid ,ISNULL(TR.Sequence,TR.Resultid) as Sno,AttributeName GroupName, CASE WHEN UPPER(ResultName) IN ('INFLUENZA A H1','INFLUENZA A H1N1PDM09','INFLUENZA A H3') THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS TestAlignment FROM (Select CAST(CustomResults AS XML) AS xmlname ,* From TestResults) TR INNER JOIN Cases C ON C.Caseid = TR.Caseid INNER JOIN CaseProcedures CP ON TR.Caseid = CP.Caseid AND TR.caseprocedureid = CP.caseprocedureid INNER JOIN OrganizationAttributes OA ON OA.AttributeValue = CAST(TR.Resultcodeid AS NVARCHAR) AND attributetype = 'ResultsGroup' AND OA.ISactive = 1 ANd AttributeName = 'COVID-19' AND C.casetype = AttributeContext AND OA.Organizationid = C.LabOrgid --OUTER APPLY xmlname.nodes('Properties/Property') a(b) WHERE CP.Procedurename != 'ABR Genes' AND Cp.Status NOT IN ('Cancelled','Deleted') AND TR.ResultStatus NOT IN ('Cancelled','Deleted') AND ISNULL(NULLIF(TR.isReportable,''),1) = 1 AND CP.Caseid = -9999 --AND ResultName IN ('Adenovirus','Coronavirus HKU1','Coronavirus NL63','Coronavirus 229E','Coronavirus OC43','Human Metapneumovirus', --'Human Rhinovirus/Enterovirus','Influenza A','Influenza A/H1','Influenza A/H1-2009','Influenza A/H3','Influenza B', --'Parainfluenza 1','Parainfluenza 2','Parainfluenza 3','Parainfluenza 4','Respiratory Syncytial Virus') ORDER BY ResultName --CP.caseprocedureid ,ISNULL(TR.Sequence,TR.Resultid)

Section.Name: Detail
Section.OnFormat: IF Results = "DETECTED" OR Results =" POSITIVE" THEN grossdescriptionLbl2.backColor = "Red" grossdescriptionLbl2.ForeColor = "White" grossdescriptionLbl2.Font.Bold = True ''ELSEIF Results = "NOT DETECTED" THEN '' grossdescriptionLbl2.ForeColor = "Green" '' grossdescriptionLbl2.Font.Bold = True ELSE grossdescriptionLbl2.ForeColor = "Black" grossdescriptionLbl2.Font.Bold = True '' grossdescriptionLbl2.Font.Bold = False END IF

DataSource.RecordSource: SELECT DISTINCT CP.Caseid, UPPER(ResultName) AS Testname, CASE WHEN TR.Flag = 'notdetected' THEN 'NOT DETECTED' ELSE UPPER(TR.Flag) END AS Results, a.b.value('@Value','Nvarchar(MAX)') AS Value, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (Order BY CP.Caseid) As SlNo,NTILE(2) OVER (ORDER BY CP.Caseid,ResultName) as RowNo , CP.caseprocedureid ,ISNULL(TR.Sequence,TR.Resultid) as Sno, CASE WHEN UPPER(ResultName) IN ('INFLUENZA A H1','INFLUENZA A H1N1PDM09','INFLUENZA A H3') THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS TestAlignment FROM (Select CAST(CustomResults AS XML) AS xmlname ,* From TestResults) TR INNER JOIN Cases C ON C.Caseid = TR.Caseid INNER JOIN CaseProcedures CP ON TR.Caseid = CP.Caseid AND TR.caseprocedureid = CP.caseprocedureid INNER JOIN OrganizationAttributes OA ON OA.AttributeValue = CAST(TR.Resultcodeid AS NVARCHAR) AND attributetype = 'ResultsGroup' AND OA.ISactive = 1 ANd AttributeName = 'Viruses' AND C.casetype = AttributeContext AND OA.Organizationid = C.LabOrgid CROSS APPLY xmlname.nodes('Properties/Property') a(b) WHERE CP.Procedurename != 'ABR Genes' AND Cp.Status NOT IN ('Cancelled','Deleted') AND TR.ResultStatus NOT IN ('Cancelled','Deleted') AND ISNULL(NULLIF(TR.isReportable,''),1) = 1 AND CP.Caseid = -9999 --AND ResultName IN ('Adenovirus','Coronavirus HKU1','Coronavirus NL63','Coronavirus 229E','Coronavirus OC43','Human Metapneumovirus', --'Human Rhinovirus/Enterovirus','Influenza A','Influenza A/H1','Influenza A/H1-2009','Influenza A/H3','Influenza B', --'Parainfluenza 1','Parainfluenza 2','Parainfluenza 3','Parainfluenza 4','Respiratory Syncytial Virus') ORDER BY UPPER(ResultName)--CP.caseprocedureid ,ISNULL(TR.Sequence,TR.Resultid)

Section.Name: Detail
Section.OnFormat:
IF Results = "DETECTED" THEN Field1.BackColor = "Red" grossdescriptionLbl2.ForeColor = "White" SiteLbl2.ForeColor = "White" ELSE Field1.BackColor = "White" grossdescriptionLbl2.ForeColor = "Black" SiteLbl2.ForeColor = "Black" END IF
IF TestAlignment = "Yes" THEN SiteLbl2.Left = 425 SiteLbl2.Width = 5400 SiteLbl2.Font.Italic = True IF Results = "DETECTED" THEN SiteLbl2.ForeColor = "White" ELSE SiteLbl2.ForeColor = "DimGray" ENDIF ELSE SiteLbl2.Left = 225 SiteLbl2.Width = 5600 SiteLbl2.Font.Italic = False IF Results = "DETECTED" THEN SiteLbl2.ForeColor = "White" ELSE SiteLbl2.ForeColor = "Black" ENDIF END IF

DataSource.RecordSource: SELECT DISTINCT CP.Caseid, UPPER(ResultName) AS Testname, CASE WHEN TR.Flag = 'notdetected' THEN 'NOT DETECTED' ELSE UPPER(TR.Flag) END AS Results, a.b.value('@Value','Nvarchar(MAX)') AS Value, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (Order BY CP.Caseid) As SlNo, CP.caseprocedureid ,ISNULL(TR.Sequence,TR.Resultid) AS RN FROM (Select CAST(CustomResults AS XML) AS xmlname ,* From TestResults) TR INNER JOIN Cases C ON C.Caseid = TR.Caseid INNER JOIN CaseProcedures CP ON TR.Caseid = CP.Caseid AND TR.caseprocedureid = CP.caseprocedureid INNER JOIN OrganizationAttributes OA ON OA.AttributeValue = CAST(TR.Resultcodeid AS NVARCHAR) AND attributetype = 'ResultsGroup' AND OA.ISactive = 1 ANd AttributeName = 'Bacteria' AND C.casetype = AttributeContext AND OA.Organizationid = C.LabOrgid CROSS APPLY xmlname.nodes('Properties/Property') a(b) WHERE CP.Procedurename != 'ABR Genes' AND Cp.Status NOT IN ('Cancelled','Deleted') AND TR.ResultStatus NOT IN ('Cancelled','Deleted') AND ISNULL(NULLIF(TR.isReportable,''),1) = 1 AND CP.Caseid = -9999 ORDER BY UPPER(ResultName)--CP.caseprocedureid ,ISNULL(TR.Sequence,TR.Resultid)

Section.Name: Detail
Section.OnFormat: IF Results = "DETECTED" THEN Field1.BackColor = "Red" grossdescriptionLbl2.ForeColor = "White" SiteLbl2.ForeColor = "White" ELSE Field1.BackColor = "White" grossdescriptionLbl2.ForeColor = "Black" SiteLbl2.ForeColor = "Black" END IF

DataSource.RecordSource:
DECLARE @COVIDDisclaimer NVARCHAR(20) = 'False',@RPIDDisclaimer NVARCHAR(20) = 'False',@Covid19RPIDQIAstatProfile NVARCHAR(20) = 'False'
SELECT * INTO #Table FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT CP.Caseid, CASE WHEN CP.Procedurename LIKE '%QIAstat%' THEN 'QIAstat' WHEN CP.Procedurename LIKE '%Thermo%' THEN 'Thermo' ELSE CP.Procedurename END AS Instrument, ResultName AS Testname,AttributeName, CASE WHEN TR.Flag = 'notdetected' THEN 'NOT DETECTED' ELSE UPPER(TR.Flag) END AS Results, --a.b.value('@Value','Nvarchar(MAX)') AS Value, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (Order BY CP.Caseid) As SlNo,NTILE(2) OVER (ORDER BY CP.Caseid,ResultName) as RowNo , CP.caseprocedureid ,ISNULL(TR.Sequence,TR.Resultid) as Sno,AttributeName GroupName, CASE WHEN UPPER(ResultName) IN ('INFLUENZA A H1','INFLUENZA A H1N1PDM09','INFLUENZA A H3') THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS TestAlignment FROM (Select CAST(CustomResults AS XML) AS xmlname ,* From TestResults) TR INNER JOIN Cases C ON C.Caseid = TR.Caseid INNER JOIN CaseProcedures CP ON TR.Caseid = CP.Caseid AND TR.caseprocedureid = CP.caseprocedureid INNER JOIN OrganizationAttributes OA ON OA.AttributeValue = CAST(TR.Resultcodeid AS NVARCHAR) AND attributetype = 'ResultsGroup' AND OA.ISactive = 1 ANd AttributeName IN ('COVID-19','Viruses','Bacteria') AND C.casetype = AttributeContext AND OA.Organizationid = C.LabOrgid --CROSS APPLY xmlname.nodes('Properties/Property') a(b) WHERE CP.Procedurename != 'ABR Genes' AND Cp.Status NOT IN ('Cancelled','Deleted') AND TR.ResultStatus NOT IN ('Cancelled','Deleted') AND ISNULL(NULLIF(TR.isReportable,''),1) = 1 AND CP.Caseid = -9999 )A --AND ResultName IN ('Adenovirus','Coronavirus HKU1','Coronavirus NL63','Coronavirus 229E','Coronavirus OC43','Human Metapneumovirus', --'Human Rhinovirus/Enterovirus','Influenza A','Influenza A/H1','Influenza A/H1-2009','Influenza A/H3','Influenza B', --'Parainfluenza 1','Parainfluenza 2','Parainfluenza 3','Parainfluenza 4','Respiratory Syncytial Virus') IF EXISTS ( Select Top 1 1 From Caseprocedures Where Caseid = -9999 AND Isordered = 1 AND Status IN ('Fulfilled','In Progress') AND Testname = 'Covid-19 with RPID (QIAstat)' )
SET @Covid19RPIDQIAstatProfile = 'True'
IF EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM #Table Where AttributeName = 'COVID-19' AND @Covid19RPIDQIAstatProfile = 'False')
SET @COVIDDisclaimer = 'True'
IF EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM #Table Where AttributeName IN ('Viruses','Bacteria'))
SET @RPIDDisclaimer = 'True'
DECLARE @COVIDInstrument NVARCHAR(255)
SELECT TOP 1 @COVIDInstrument = Instrument FROM #Table Where AttributeName = 'COVID-19' AND Instrument IS NOT NULL
DECLARE @RPIDInstrument NVARCHAR(255)
SELECT TOP 1 @RPIDInstrument = Instrument FROM #Table Where AttributeName IN ('Viruses','Bacteria') AND Instrument IS NOT NULL
--Select * From Caseprocedures Where caseid = -9999 --AND Status NOT IN ('Deleted','Deleted') --AND Isordered = 1
DECLARE @NYRDisclaimer NVARCHAR(20) = 'False' IF EXISTS ( Select Top 1 1 From Cases Where Caseid = -9999 AND Notes LIKE '%Performed at NYReopen%' ) BEGIN SET @NYRDisclaimer = 'True' END
Select Caseid,@RPIDDisclaimer RPIDDisclaimer, @RPIDInstrument RPIDInstrument,@Covid19RPIDQIAstatProfile Covid19RPIDQIAstatProfile,@NYRDisclaimer NYRDisclaimer, @COVIDDisclaimer COVIDDisclaimer,@COVIDInstrument COVIDInstrument,'\b Disclaimer: \b0 The RT-PCR for COVID-19 assay was developed and the performance characteristics determined by P4 Diagnostix. Notification to the Food and Drug Administration has been provided and an Emergency Use Authorization request will be submitted in accordance with the “Policy for Diagnostic Tests for Coronavirus Disease-2019 during the Public Health Emergency” guidance released by the FDA. This test is used for clinical purposes. It should not be regarded as investigational or for research. A result of "Not Detected" does not rule out nucleic acid concentrations below the limit of detection of the assay or the presence of PCR inhibitors in the patient specimen. Improper specimen handling can cause false negatives. False positives can be caused by PCR contamination. The COVID-19 assay is a multiplexed nucleic acid test using real-time PCR for qualitative detection of COVID-19 utilizing the FDA Emergency Use Authorization (EUA) authorized Centers for Disease Control and Prevention''s (CDC) 2019-Novel Coronavirus (2019-nCoV) Real-Time Reverse Transcriptase (RT)-PCR Diagnostic Panel. The results of this test should not be used as the sole basis for diagnosis, treatment or other management decisions. Negative results in the setting of a respiratory illness may be due to infection with pathogens that are not detected by the test or lower respiratory tract infection that is not detected by a nasopharyngeal swab specimen. Positive results do not rule out co-infection with other organisms: the agent(s) detected by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention''s (CDC) 2019-Novel Coronavirus (2019-nCoV) Real-Time Reverse Transcriptase (RT)-PCR Diagnostic Panel may not be the definite cause of disease. Additional laboratory testing (e.g., bacterial and viral culture, immunofluorescence and radiography) may be necessary when evaluating a patient with possible respiratory tract infection.' Disclaimer From Cases Where Caseid = -9999
DROP TABLE #Table

Field.Name: TcDisclaimerCtl3
Field.Text: Disclaimer: The QIAstat-Dx® Respiratory Panel assay is a multiplexed nucleic acid test using real-time PCR for simultaneous qualitative detection and identification of multiple respiratory viral and bacterial nucleic. The results of this test should not be used as the sole basis for diagnosis, treatment or other management decisions. Negative results in the setting of a respiratory illness may be due to infection with pathogens that are not detected by the test or lower respiratory tract infection that is not detected by a nasopharyngeal swab specimen. Positive results do not rule out coinfection with other organisms: the agent(s) detected by the QIAstat-Dx Respiratory Panel may not be the definite cause of disease. Additional laboratory testing (e.g., bacterial and viral culture, immunofluorescence and radiography) may be necessary when evaluating a patient with possible respiratory tract infection.

Field.Name: TcDisclaimerCtl4
Field.Text: The COVID-19 assay is a multiplexed nucleic acid test using real-time PCR for qualitative detection of COVID-19 utilizing the FDA Emergency Use Authorization (EUA) authorized Centers for Disease Control and Prevention's (CDC) 2019-Novel Coronavirus (2019-nCoV) Real-Time Reverse Transcriptase (RT)-PCR Diagnostic Panel. The results of this test should not be used as the sole basis for diagnosis, treatment or other management decisions. Negative results in the setting of a respiratory illness may be due to infection with pathogens that are not detected by the test or lower respiratory tract infection that is not detected by a nasopharyngeal swab specimen. Positive results do not rule out co-infection with other organisms: the agent(s) detected by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention's (CDC) 2019-Novel Coronavirus (2019-nCoV) Real-Time Reverse Transcriptase (RT)-PCR Diagnostic Panel may not be the definite cause of disease. Additional laboratory testing (e.g., bacterial and viral culture, immunofluorescence and radiography) may be necessary when evaluating a patient with possible respiratory tract infection.

Field.Name: TcDisclaimerCtl2
Field.Text: QIAstat-Dx Respiratory SARS-CoV-2 Panel is a multiplexed nucleic acid test intended for use with QIAstat-Dx system for the simultaneous qualitative detection and identification of multiple respiratory viral and bacterial nucleic acids in nasopharyngeal swabs (NPS) eluted in universal transport media (UTM) obtained from individuals with signs and symptoms of infection or who are suspected of COVID-19 by their healthcare provider. Testing is limited to laboratories certified under the Clinical Laboratory Improvement Amendments of 1988 (CLIA), 42 U.S.C. §263a, to perform high complexity tests. The following organism types and subtypes are identified using the QIAstat-Dx Respiratory SARS-CoV-2 Panel: Adenovirus, Coronavirus 229E, Coronavirus HKU1, Coronavirus NL63, Coronavirus OC43, SARS-CoV-2, Human Metapneumovirus A+B, Influenza A, Influenza A H1, Influenza A H3, Influenza A H1N1/pdm09, Influenza B, Parainfluenza virus 1, Parainfluenza virus 2, Parainfluenza virus 3, Parainfluenza virus 4, Rhinovirus/Enterovirus, Respiratory Syncytial Virus A+B, Bordetella pertussis, Chlamydophila pneumoniae and Mycoplasma pneumoniae. The SARS-CoV-2 RNA is generally detectable in NPS during the acute phase of infection. Positive results are indicative of active infection. Laboratories within the United States and its territories are required to report all positive results to the appropriate public health authorities. Negative results do not preclude SARS-CoV-2 infection and should not be used as the sole basis for patient management decisions. Negative results must be combined with clinical observations, patient history, and epidemiological information. For the other organisms, the detection and identification of specific viral and bacterial nucleic acids from individuals presenting with signs and symptoms of a respiratory infection aids in the diagnosis of respiratory infection if used in conjunction with other clinical and epidemiological information. The results of this test should not be used as the sole basis for diagnosis, treatment, or other management decisions. Negative results in the setting of a respiratory illness may be due to infection with pathogens that are not detected by the test or lower respiratory tract infection that is not detected by a nasopharyngeal swab specimen. Positive results do not rule out coinfection with other organisms: the agent(s) detected by the QIAstat-Dx Respiratory SARS-CoV-2 Panel may not be the definite cause of disease. Additional laboratory testing (e.g., bacterial and viral culture, immunofluorescence, and radiography) may be necessary when evaluating a patient with possible respiratory tract infection. The QIAstat-Dx Respiratory SARS-CoV-2 Panel is intended for use by trained clinical laboratory personnel specifically instructed and trained in the techniques of real-time PCR and in vitro diagnostic procedures. The QIAstat-Dx Respiratory SARS-CoV-2 Panel is only for use under the Food and Drug Administration’s Emergency Use Authorization.

Field.Name: TcDisclaimerCtl8
Field.Text: Disclaimer: The RT-PCR for COVID-19 assay was developed and the performance characteristics determined by P4 Diagnostix. Notification to the Food and Drug Administration has been provided, an Emergency Use Authorization request will be submitted in accordance with the “Policy for Diagnostic Tests for Coronavirus Disease-2019 during the Public Health Emergency” guidance released by the FDA. This test is used for clinical purposes. It should not be regarded as investigational or for research. A result of "Not Detected" does not rule out nucleic acid concentrations below the limit of detection of the assay or the presence of PCR inhibitors in the patient specimen. Improper specimen handling can cause false negatives. False positives can be caused by PCR contamination.

Field.Name: TcDisclaimerCtl9

The results of this test should not be used as the sole basis for diagnosis, treatment or other management decisions. Negative results in the setting of a respiratory illness may be due to infection with pathogens that are not detected by the test or lower respiratory tract infection that is not detected by a nasopharyngeal swab specimen. Positive results do not rule out coinfection with other organisms: the agent(s) detected by the RPiD Respiratory Panel may not be the definite cause of disease. Additional laboratory testing (e.g., bacterial and viral culture, immunofluorescence and radiography) may be necessary when evaluating a patient with possible respiratory tract infection.

DataSource.RecordSource: SELECT CASE WHEN NULLIF(clia,'') IS NULL THEN 'Testing Performed by ' + accountname +' at '+ accountaddress + ', ' + accountcityaddress + ', Medical Director: '+ CASE WHEN Labaccountid = 38648 THEN ISNULL(NULLIF(Medicaldirector,''),'Raul Rudelli, MD') ELSE ISNULL(Medicaldirector,'') END+ '.' ELSE 'Testing performed by ' + accountname +' at '+ accountaddress + ', ' + accountcityaddress + '. CLIA#: ' + CLIA + ', Medical Director: '+ CASE WHEN Labaccountid = 38648 THEN ISNULL(NULLIF(Medicaldirector,''),'Raul Rudelli, MD') ELSE ISNULL(Medicaldirector,'') END END AS TechDisclaimer, CASE WHEN NULLIF(Pathclia,'') IS NULL THEN 'Professional Component performed at ' + PathAccountName + ', ' + Pathaccountaddress + ', ' + Pathaccountcityaddress +'.' ELSE 'Professional Component performed at ' + PathAccountName + ', ' + Pathaccountaddress + ', ' + Pathaccountcityaddress +'. CLIA#: ' + PathCLIA + ', Medical Director: '+ Medicaldirector END AS ProfDisclaimer,labaccountid,Caseid FROM ( SELECT TOP 1 dbo.GetCSVFor5(ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(al.ParentAccountName), '') + CHAR(13) + CHAR(10), '') + al.Address1, al.Address2, al.Street,'','') As AccountAddress , dbo.GetCSVFor5(al.City + ', ' + ISNULL(al.State, '') + ' ' + ISNULL(al.Zip, ''), '', '','','') AS AccountCityAddress , al.accountname AS AccountName,al.phone, al.fax, al.clia ,c.LabAccountId, c.PathAccountId, caseid ,dbo.GetCSVFor5(ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(ap.ParentAccountName), '') + CHAR(13) + CHAR(10), '') + ap.Address1, ap.Address2, ap.Street,'','') As PathAccountAddress , dbo.GetCSVFor5(ap.City + ', ' + ISNULL(ap.State, '') + ' ' + ISNULL(ap.Zip, ''), '', '','','') AS PathAccountCityAddress , ap.accountname AS PathAccountName,ap.phone AS PathPhone, ap.fax AS PathFax, ap.clia AS PathClia ,dbo.GetCSVFor5(ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(aOF.ParentAccountName), '') + CHAR(13) + CHAR(10), '') + aOF.Address1, aOF.Address2, aOF.Street,'','') As OFAccountAddress , dbo.GetCSVFor5(aOF.City + ', ' + ISNULL(aOF.State, '') + ' ' + ISNULL(aOF.Zip, ''), '', '','','') AS OFAccountCityAddress , aOF.Accountname AS OFAccountName,aOF.phone AS OFPhone, aOF.fax AS OFFax, aOF.clia AS OFClia ,c.services, (SELECT TOP 1 FormattedDisplayName FROM Users U INNER JOIN UserAccountRoles UAR ON U.userid = UAR.userid WHERE ISNULL(UAR.isMedicalDirector,0) = 1 AND UAR.accountid = ISNULL(c.pathaccountid,C.Labaccountid) AND UAR.rolename='Pathologist' AND U.status = 'active')as Medicaldirector from cases c INNER JOIN accounts al on al.accountid=c.labaccountid LEFT JOIN accounts ap on ap.accountid=c.pathaccountid LEFT JOIN accounts aOF on aOF.accountid=c.OFaccountid Where caseid=-9999 )a
