DataSource.RecordSource:
;WITH CTE AS ( SELECT DISTINCT CP.Caseid, ResultName, Attributename, CP.Procedurename, CASE WHEN TR.Flag = 'notdetected' THEN 'NOT DETECTED' ELSE UPPER(TR.Flag) END AS Flag FROM TestResults TR INNER JOIN Cases C ON C.caseid = TR.caseid INNER JOIN CaseProcedures CP ON TR.Caseid = CP.Caseid AND TR.caseprocedureid = CP.caseprocedureid LEFT JOIN OrganizationAttributes OA ON OA.AttributeValue = CAST(TR.Resultcodeid AS NVARCHAR) AND attributetype = 'GeneAntibioticMapping' AND OA.ISactive = 1 AND C.casetype = AttributeContext AND OA.Organizationid = C.LabOrgid WHERE Cp.Status NOT IN ('Cancelled','Deleted') AND TR.ResultStatus NOT IN ('Cancelled','Deleted') AND ISNULL(NULLIF(TR.isReportable,''),1) = 1 AND CP.Caseid = -9999 AND CP.procedurename NOT IN ('Controls') AND CAST(TR.Resultcodeid AS NVARCHAR) NOT IN (SELECT AttributeValue FROM OrganizationAttributes OA WHERE Attributetype = 'ResultsGroup' AND OA.ISactive = 1 AND C.casetype = AttributeContext AND OA.Organizationid = C.LabOrgid AND AttributeName = 'Controls') )
SELECT DISTINCT Caseid,'Pathogens Tested:' As Tested, STUFF((SELECT distinct ', ' + p1.ResultName FROM CTE p1 WHERE p.Caseid = p1.Caseid FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE ).value('.', 'NVARCHAR(MAX)') ,1,1,'') AS ResultName FROM CTE p

LabAccountPhoneFaxCtl1.Value = "" If trim(LabAccountPhone) <> "" Then LabAccountPhoneFaxCtl1.Value = "Phone: " + LabAccountPhone End If If trim(LabAccountFax) <> "" Then LabAccountFaxCtl1.Value = "Fax: " + LabAccountFax End If

IF LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "final" OR LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "review" OR LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "final with supplemental" OR LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "preliminary" OR LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "amendment" OR LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "corrected" OR LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "addendum" OR LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "amendment with supplemental" OR LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "corrected with supplemental" OR LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "addendum with supplemental" OR LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "preliminary with supplemental" OR LCASE(TRIM(reportstatus)) = "review with supplemental" OR LCASE(TRIM(status)) = "amendment - pending sign-out" OR LCASE(TRIM(status)) = "correction - pending sign-out" OR LCASE(TRIM(status)) = "archived" OR LCASE(TRIM(status)) = "addendum - pending sign-out" OR LCASE(TRIM(status)) = "supplemental - pending acknowledgement" OR LCASE(TRIM(status)) = "distribution complete" THEN TitleLbl1.Text = IIF(LCASE(TRIM((Services))) = "consult", "COVID-19 Consult Report", "COVID-19 Report") ENDIF

DataSource.RecordSource:
IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb.dbo.#fishdummy1', 'U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #fishdummy1;
CREATE TABLE #fishdummy1 (CDFName VARCHAR(max), CDFDispalayValue VARCHAR(max),CDFType VARCHAR(max), CDFLabel VARCHAR(max))
DECLARE @xml_var XML SET @xml_var = ( select CustomControlData from cases where caseid=-9999 and CustomControlData is not null
)
DECLARE @CDFName VARCHAR(1000), @CDFDispalayValue VARCHAR(1000), @CDFType VARCHAR(1000), @CDFLabel VARCHAR(1000)
INSERT INTO #fishdummy1(CDFName,CDFDispalayValue,CDFType,CDFLabel) SELECT * FROM ( SELECT Tbl.Col.value('@CDFName', 'varchar(1000)') as CDFName, Tbl.Col.value('@CDFDisplayValue', 'varchar(1000)') as CDFDispalayValue, Tbl.Col.value('@CDFType', 'varchar(1000)') as CDFType, Tbl.Col.value('@CDFLabel', 'varchar(1000)') as CDFLabel FROM @xml_var.nodes('//Data') Tbl(Col) )a
DECLARE @virus NVARCHAR(20)= 'False' IF EXISTS ( Select 1 From Caseprocedures CP --INNER JOIN Procedures P ON CP.procedureid = P.procedureid AND CP.testid = P.testid WHERE CP.caseid = -9999 AND (CP.status = 'Fulfilled' or CP.status='In Progress') and ISNULL(CP.OtherProcedureName,CP.ProcedureName) IN
('Lactoferrin','Pancreatic Elastase','H. Pylori') ) SET @virus = 'True'
SELECT @virus Virus,CDF.TestName AS CDFName,Case when CDF.Result='NOTDETECTED' THEN 'NOT DETECTED' ELSE CDF.Result END Results, ISNULL(CP.OtherProcedureName,CP.ProcedureName) AS TestName FROM CaseProcedures CP --INNER JOIN Procedures P ON CP.procedureid = P.procedureid AND CP.testid = P.testid LEFT JOIN (Select REPLACE(cdfname,'result','') TestName,CDFDispalayValue as Result,LTRIM(RTRIM(REPLACE(CDFLabel,'result',''))) AS CDFLabel from #fishdummy1 ) CDF ON CP.procedurename=CDFLabel WHERE CP.caseid = -9999 AND (CP.status = 'Fulfilled' or CP.status='In Progress') and ISNULL(CP.OtherProcedureName,CP.ProcedureName) IN ('Lactoferrin','Pancreatic Elastase','H. Pylori')

Section.Name: Detail
Section.OnFormat:
IF Results = "DETECTED" THEN Field3.BackColor = "Red" grossdescriptionLbl2.ForeColor = "White" SiteLbl2.ForeColor = "White" ELSE Field3.BackColor = "White" grossdescriptionLbl2.ForeColor = "Black" SiteLbl2.ForeColor = "Black"
END IF

Section.Name: HeaderVirus
Section.OnFormat: IF Virus = "True" THEN HeaderVirus.Visible = True Detail.visible = True ELSE HeaderVirus.Visible = False Detail.visible = False END IF

DataSource.RecordSource: Select 1

Section.Name: HeaderVirus
Section.OnFormat: IF Virus = "True" THEN HeaderVirus.Visible = True Detail.visible = True ELSE HeaderVirus.Visible = False Detail.visible = False END IF

Field.Name: Field1
Field.Text: SARS-COV-2, RNA, the coronavirus associated with COVID-19, was (NOT DETECTED or WAS DETECTED) as determined using a test for the direct detection of nucleic acid from SARS-CoV-2. Nucleic acid tests include PCR, RT-PCR, or TMA. This test has not been cleared or approved by the FDA. This test has been authorized for use under an Emergency Use Authorization (EAU) by the FDA. NOT DETECTED results do not expressly preclude SARS-CoV-2 infection and should not be used as the sole basis for patient management decisions especially following a recent exposure and/or the presence of clinical signs and symptoms consistent with COVID-19. If COVID-19 is still suspected, re-testing should be considered in consultation with public health authorities.
